label_title: ... Number one moving gps app now
review: I used another flawless app for over  5 years until that app developer quit and it came off iTunes, so this app moved up to #1 top pick. A very well planned out gps app for RV, motorcycle, car, walks ... And it is Best Gps for the money spent!  Thank you.
Back up for offline use is awesome
Better than Apple Maps and Google Maps.
Good app for when you're out of the country and don't want to use cell data. Just make sure you download the maps first when you're connected to WiFi.
Doesn't work. Doesn't load.  Awful.
I use this app for motorcycle navigation but once I miss a turn reroute me and just stays silent. So it is essentially useless for me.
This app is horrible!  I just paid $8.99 for an app that is completely useless and doesn't do a single thing besides stay frozen on one point of the map.  I want my money back!

It's a great offline map to have! I so recommend it to everyone. The problem for the iPad is that is having trouble reading the location of my device offline. It's ok with the direction mapping, but the location blip is not moving at all.
Nice !

Purchased the 30-day version of the app to try out the speed limit monitoring function.  1st trip was on I-12 to I-59 to I-20 to I-65.  Speed limit displayed worked on I-12 even though sections of I-12 were displaying the wrong speed limits,, partially on I-59, but didn't diplay at all on I-20 and I-65.  Too bad because it looked like a promising GPS app.

As an ex Motionx Drive GPS user (no longer providing the app), I was hoping to find something comparable. However I am very disappointed with CoPilot for the following reasons. 1) The maps I use (West Coast and Hawaii) are very outdated. Twice the GPS took me to dead ends and many times the street names do not match the signs.  2) Very confusing on complex transitions. Lanes assist makes it worse in some cases because it does not get you in the correct lane for the next turn. 3) It should show you the next two turns when they are close together. 4) A big feature I thought was suppose to work is showing the speed limit. This is very important when driving in unfamiliar roads. 5) Should show cars speed when on a route like it does when just displaying the map. 6) Every screen should have a map button to jump right back to your route. 7) There should be a list of recently used routes/locations.  I can go on and on. Anyway, waisted $10 and going to try Waze again.  It does not have all the features I want but at least the maps are current.
With the map on my phone i can navigate offline. Between waze, google maps and others, this app can keep running without internet. üòé
Best app ever

I have been using Copilot for a while now. While the directions are good and the maps accurate, I have yet to find how to put a name to a location.

I would like to be able to enter an address and give it a name, not just the address.

I would like to be able to be at a location that I want to save, but have not figured out how to give it a name.

Now in my 'favorites' I have lots of addresses, but have to think about where I want to go from the list.
I like it so far.
This app makes my life so much easier when we‚Äôre on the road.

I have tried other apps, but none come even close to this one!

I travel in my Motorhome about six months  out of the year and this app is indispensable!

Very accurate database!

label_title: ABSOLUTELY THE BEST APP FOR TRAVEL!
review: 3 years ago we went full time NOMAD & I have used this app every single day. Even if we‚Äôre camped for a few days I still use it to decide where we‚Äôre we going next. If you‚Äôre doing any kind of traveling it is worth having in your app Arsenal.

I have been using this app for a couple of years now and have grown dependent on it. However not everyplace shows up here and I check other apps as well. I see that it opens to the area that you are I. But I use it for planning trips and the app opening to a much larger area would work better for that. By much larger I mean state or nation then I can quickly zoom in to the place I want to head instead of having to back out then zoom in toward the location I‚Äôm headed.
We rely on it for locations for fuel, propane, walmart, rest areas and RV parks.  Easy to use and accurate.

label_title: Must have app for living on the road!
review: I‚Äôve been using this app for year now. I come from using maps and my GPS and to using this app has help me out in locating a nice quite campground away from traffic with showers to right off the main highway for a quick power nap and back on the road. I strongly suggest anyone that spends as much time on the road as me to have this app as a back up or a quick look to what‚Äôs near you or on the way.
I use this app all the time! I have found it to be very accurate and the reviews are very helpful. By far, the best RV app out there!
The only improvement would be to add additional options like links to Havest Hosts, Boondockers Welcome. It‚Äôs a great app and I use it first

This app has allowed us to travel all over the US and stop in many interesting places. Information is complete and accurate. User reviews are trustworthy. It has replaced my navigation app for finding rest stops and what is at the next exit. It is frequently updated and improved. Thanks!

We have been using this app for over 6 years. It has been perfect. It has saved us lots of time and money. I recommend it
To everyone on the road.
I have been using the app and pc version for the last seven years in my travels across the United States. This is the best tool I have found to help plan my trips.

My husband and I traveled for a year in our RV. We are seasoned world travelers and found this app to be absolutely critical in our daily plans and safe travels. We do not even recommend any other app. It has so many important features that a traveler who makes no reservations needs. We are not the type of travelers to go to RV parks so the features with being able to know where BLM land is are invaluable. We literally make no plans when we travel because all stays is so helpful in every aspect. The Adventure Travelers

Have found the app to be useful, comprehensive and informative. Especially like the feature that allows you to view park specific images. It expedites Her Majesty‚Äôs approval or rejection of any given stop, planned or unplanned. I have two other campground apps on my phone that are rarely used other than to see if Allstays missed anything.
Essential app when traveling. The user reviews are good.

Awesome app but, wish there was an easier method to submit corrections. As a full time RV‚Äôer I don‚Äôt always have access to email. Snowflower RV camp is NOT open year round. We just happened to get there before the end of the season. However, that might not be the case for others. But, with that said the app is extremely valuable for finding a spot on the fly for overnight, stores, propane, dumps, etc. Thank you for your efforts.

This is a very useful app. I also use Alston‚Äôs 
Pro online. The only minor complaint I have is the map scaling. As one zooms in and out the scaling changes, as you‚Äôd expect,but the highway identifiers are lost so it can be hard to follow a highway to a destination, choosing sites along the way. One has to try and remember physical changes such as bends or geographic features to know what road you‚Äôre following. I suspect that the road identifiers are imported from a commercial database and the developer has no control over where they are located. As it is, if you zoom in to find a campground you‚Äôll lose the highway identifier and you‚Äôll have to zoom back out to see it.

label_title: Just need to add routing for 5 stars
review: Great database app
üêæ
It is nice to have a resource to help find out of the way camping spots as well as anything camping related.
A truly great app.  I‚Äôm a full-time RV‚Äôer and it‚Äôs gotten me into some great sites.  Worth every penny.

label_title: Best App for Full Timers and adventurous Part Timers!!
review:
Features filtering to display only the info you want and displays it in a very clean easy to use and understand format. 

Makes finding BLM land, gas stations, and campgrounds all on one screen super convenient and easy for me/copilot. 

It can also show/filter specific store brands, propane equipped places, and all sorts of different types of parks (state, national, etc), RV services, misc dump stations, rest areas, truck stops and honestly much more than I care to list out. 

If you‚Äôre a full timer this is a must have app. Part timers will find it useful to find little hidden BLM land hideaways and see sites that are otherwise difficult to find via google like staying on the Army Corps of Engineers spots, and a wide variety of campgrounds the general public just doesn‚Äôt know about.

We‚Äôve spent 6 months in the last 13 on the road & Ive not only come to rely heavily on AllStays, but use it almost exclusively. Love how it send you to Google or Apple maps that take us right to the campground entrance. And I read the reviews & have added my own. Great app!
Always my go to app for camping. Thorough and accurate reviews.
I‚Äôve been using this app for 3 ¬Ω years now. It‚Äôs my go-to app when I want to check out RV parks or find a rest area or dump station.
We use this app to plan all our trips! Very functional app! All the data has been reliable for the 3 years we have been using it!

label_title: Lots of good info, but flawed
review:
This app has a lot of good info, but the filtering feature is so ridiculously complex that it‚Äôs nearly impossible to filter out, say, campgrounds that don‚Äôt take RVs. 

But biggest glaring omission is that there‚Äôs no way to mark campgrounds as favorites... places you find here that you want to try when in the area!  This would improve the apps usefulness a lot.

label_title: Best all around travel app for campers
review: Never leave home without it

label_title: Using for more than just RV Parks
review:
Have been using the All Stays app for 18 months now, and have found it great for finding and booking RV parks. The app became invaluable, during an emergency we had last year, which required plan changes while we were driving down the interstate.
We also use it to find dump stations, in the Nevada/Idaho Great Basin area, where services are few and far between. Have it downloaded on both the iPhone and iPad.

I‚Äôve been using Allstays RV for about 7 years. It is so much better than the old books that we used to have to find campgrounds. This is the only app that I‚Äôve ever actually spent money for. Best investment ever.

label_title: Indispensable if you are rving or camping
review: We have traveled by rv across the US and Canada a few months per year. We plan everything with Allstays Pro. All the info at your fingertips! It rocks!

We are attempting to camp in all 48 states and visit all the mainland national parks. This app a dream come true for camping with our tag along. Please put campground reviews on this site every time you camp somewhere!

We‚Äôre full time RV‚Äôrs and we use this App almost exclusively for planning AND navigating (although I usually keep the GPS on as backup if we lose cell coverage or I want to know elevation).
I‚Äôm hoping that soon you‚Äôll be able to link All Stays to your tablet  GPS when you select a choice of navigation map?
Anyway - highly recommended!!
I use this all the time. It has everything we need to travel. We use the Elks and Moose lodges a lot. Thanks for a great travel app.

I whole heartily endorse allstays app . Once you learn to navigate the app it‚Äôs a treasure trove of travel information ( it‚Äôs not hard to learn to do!)

People using the app can add information to help keep things up to date. 

Need a restroom just scroll down the road & look for the R icon this will tell you if and where there is one on your route & the mileage to it 

Campgrounds, Walmart‚Äôs , repair shop, propane, fuel ,with reviews & the mileage to them.

And all easy to get the information you need.
This is a terrific application for finding and choosing the right Campground. This app and RV TripWizard (an online app) are incredibly for local and long-distance trip planning.

We use this app almost exclusively for finding places to stay, to double check our route for diesel stops (especially in Canada), check road grades and low clearances.  The filter feature is excellent for tailoring your search.  We use it with Apple or Google maps and have found no need for any other RV GPS.

I've used this app mostly for finding camping spots I'd never heard of! I like that you can call right from the app, or go to the many links and back, with ease.  I've also used it for finding a place to dump - a real challenge at times. The ratings seem to accurately reflect what I've found.
I can‚Äôt imagine anyone giving this site a rating less than five I have been using this site for several years now I travel all over the country and I think this is better than Swiss cheese

label_title: Big Rig fuel info? Not here.
review: For big rig fuel info this app is a waste of time. If you have a big rig and are looking for an app to help find fuel this app ain‚Äôt the one. It lists fuel stops but there no way to tell if you can get in and out without problems. And the images most often show nothing of the fuel station rather they shows local attractions.
Don‚Äôt get to travel much but when I do I use this apt
We use this app everyday to find campgrounds. I also use it for navigation because i feel they do the best job listing high grade roads and low clearances. Must have for Fulltimers!
This is our go to source when driving our RV. Very helpful, especially for info and services beyond campgrounds.
The only thing that would make this app a five star is if it had a trip planner.  Other than that it was a terrific app for finding campsites and gas stops on several of our trips.
We would.be literally lost traveling around without this app. A plethora of very useful camp and travel related information. Priceless.
My go to source for going down the road. Everything I need in one app: what, where, what to expect once I‚Äôm there. Plan all our trips with it.

label_title: Since this spring it hangs frequently
review: I have loved this app and used it for 5 years - rated it 5 stars, back then. Seems to have gone downhill since then and lost functionality. Sad

I use this as I just wander around the country. Using the map as I move along is super helpful as it is for planning. I just did 3000 miles as it was a great resource. Gives adequate info to even pick sites! And I like solitude. It seems to be able to work when my phone doesn‚Äôt.
Feature Request & General Problem Reporting not currently working.

When planning a trip, this is the only app I use. Great information on RV Parks, travel stops, Road Grades, etc.
Don‚Äôt leave home without it.
The best and up to date app for anyone traveling for any length of time.We have used it consistently for several years and it has never let us down.
I‚Äôve used Allstays for two years and have found that it meets all the needs I have in planning a trip and finding a campground. We travel about a third of the year and this is my go to app.
I recommend this app to every friend that camps. Worth every penny.

label_title: This App is a MUST have. Highly, highly recommend.
review: Drove California to Key West, Florida never had a problem finding a place to stay. From Truck stops, to rest areas, to campsites/RV Parks, Walmart‚Äôs... I could go on and on. Gives you accurate addresses and phone numbers to make reservations ahead of time or just before stopping. Every place to stay you‚Äôll find it right along your planned route.

I cant believe how much easier this app makes rv  life in planning and on the road. 
Its much appreciated.
Excellent resource. Sometimes I wish descriptions were more up to date but that‚Äôs up to the users like me to upload more comments.
I used this app non-stop on my trip to Canada. I use it around my area, too, to look for RV resources. The icons‚Äî especially Costco for gas, Walmart for boondocking‚Äî help me tremendously.
Allstays has helped me find city or county campgrounds that are not part of the regular ‚Äòchains‚Äô like KOA or Good Sam.

I really wanted to like this App, but find it next to useless. Searching for a specific rv site is beyond frustrating. Search for Ohio (or whatever state) and the state centers on the map. Search for a site (State park, campground etc) nothing happens. You can find it by browsing the hundreds of campgrounds that appear when an entire region is selected but that is hunt and peck. Tried to contact Allstays support for add a feature or help and nothing happens, I guess that is there for looks.

Reliable information. Integrates with Google Maps and Apple maps, so you can plan your route.
Great way to check for Rest Stops, gas stations, low clearance - even outdoor stores like Cabela‚Äôs along your route.

A must have while planning your travels. My only wish would be for it to have more reviews per campsite and if it could have a way we could pin our favorites or what we want to remember on the map for ourselves while trip planning.

label_title: Very Good, but needs some improvement
review:
Overall the app is very good & I recommend it to all of my RV friends. I've been using it for about 3 years now and I live in my RV half the year wandering around North America. 
The main issue I have is searching larger areas than what shows up when you pick a State & town. Oftentimes nothing shows up for a town when there are RV Parks in the general area, but not listed for that town. 
Searching a region on the map page helps, but it's not always convenient if you don't know the area well. 
Again, it's a very good app, and 98% accurate. Just not always convenient to find a stop when traveling.
One of the most useful RV apps I‚Äôve used. Using the map and applying filters to quickly find parks and reviews, dump stations, RV friendly Walmarts, truck stops etc. well worth the few dollars.
All Stays is indispensable for planning RV trips.  The reviews and info are very helpful.  Only downside is that the photos do not always match the campsite.

If you are wanting to find places to stay without fees, this is not the app for you. 
The listings are heavily dominant with paid camping and parks. 
Boring. 
iOverlander is a far superior app for free camping and the app is free as well. 
I feel misled with this apps description and regret paying for it.

label_title: Has most of the needed information...
review: This app is pretty descent. Has the main campgrounds, facilities and such. Not much different from most map apps. However, this is a camp app, so why is there so many places missing??  They seemed to have about 60% of the dispersed camping covered, but lacks details on where it starts and stops.
One of 3 or 4 go-to apps for figuring out where I‚Äôm going next.  I‚Äôm amazed at the people who don‚Äôt even know about Allstays.  How do they ever plan anything?
Use it all the time all around the country.
We don‚Äôt set firm plans when we travel. This app shows us plenty of options.
Used it only for 5 days so far on our journey. Invaluable for deciding where to stay. Helped us with out of the way, excellent campsites for our truck camper.

label_title: The greatest app on my phone
review: This app helped me on my spontaneous crosscountry road trip to help me find places to sleep along the way. I didn‚Äôt need to interrupt my trip to scour the internet for camping. The app gave all the info I needed without cumbersome, bloated functions. Simple and gets right to the point, the way all software should be designed. Thanks!

label_title: The only camping app that has everything
review: Sometimes hard to search for a place on it but otherwise it‚Äôs the only game in town.

label_title: Pretty good but be careful, some map campgrounds are wrong
review: I found a koa near Austin mn and book it. But found out that it thought it was the Hayward wi koa and I lost $10 cancelling the reservation. It should be the albert lea/Austin koa. Take away, you need to double check everything!!

We just returned from an 8 week cross country trip with our new 27‚Äô Sunseeker. I navigated hour by hour with no reservations, boondocking mostly but finding great campgrounds every few days to do laundry and rest. We saw this beautiful country in a way you can only see from the road. We knew where every rest area, gas station and Walmart were in our 7000 mile trek well in advance. I never could have done it without Allstays Camp & RV. I won‚Äôt leave home for more than 30 miles without it again.

label_title: Terrible interface and difficult to use!!!!
review: Recommended by a friend. This is most expensive app I had brought but quality is worst than some of free apps!! To start of, app does not remember my setting, meaning everytime I open app I have to select/tap from a long list of options. And the results is not acute. Walmart for example, when I select "Walmart only" a lot of locations that show up on other setting was not shown. There are many free apps out there you can use that is better than this!!! Such ripoff!!! Should have check out other free apps first before purchasing this one :(
So far this app is very disappointing. I expected more. When I see stars indicating a review has been entered, it shows there are none. It pulls up photos from google... I could do that myself!

I love the link to the campgrounds websites for more specific information and to make a reservation. Or to know how many first come, non-reservable campsites exist. 
I see they include steep road grades and indicate severity by %.  That‚Äôs a real helpful feature for my trailering. 
I can‚Äôt say it‚Äôs not improve able. But it‚Äôs well worth the money!
I had written on an earlier review that the coverage of the western United States was Lacking. Lately the coverage on the western United States area has been a lot better.
Gives you many options for campgrounds, gas stations and more. Works perfect. Must have for traveling
Lots of missing campsites, and latest information is not being updated
Good app to have when in unfamiliar territory but not all fuel stations and campgrounds listed.

We were looking for overnight parking around Orlando. This app shows a few in south FL. If you go to RV Parky app which is free app it shows several around Orlando. Free app is much more helpful than Allstays Camping app that we paid $10 for.

This app is becoming more and more irrelevant every day. Plenty of other apps do the same thing in a nicer interface. This app is dated. The UI is very old and doesn‚Äôt use the standards. It would never be accepted as a new app. The campground reviews are usually years old, very few recent reviews in most cases. Doesn‚Äôt remember your settings between launches. Doesn‚Äôt track cell signal service like other apps do. Doesn‚Äôt let you filter by amenities like other apps do. Rarely gets updated. Campground and/or location search usually doesn‚Äôt work and it doesn‚Äôt use partial matching like other apps do. Doesn‚Äôt let you save favorites like other apps do. Starting to see the trend here?

A comprehensive app that we rely upon when
We embark on a trip. Can‚Äôt imagine being on the road without it,
This app has it all.  Replaced all my books using this app.  So many great features.  So much information in one place.  Haven't tried to send the item to a google or Waze map yet.  Next trip out.

This is the most complete app I have used. It has links to campground websites, reservations, directions w/GPS coordinates, reviews and even weather forecasts for the area. Includes both public parks and private campgrounds. Worth every penny!
I want my $10 back.  I can get this info and more in a free app. How do I get a refund?

I use this every time we set out on a trip.  Super easy to find a camp site once you‚Äôve selected a general area.  We use it a lot for impromptu overnight stays when road tripping.  Reviews are accurate and helpful.  Links to reservation sites, photos, reviews, phone numbers make it easy to select and book.
This APP is the ultimately Best APP for RV travelers! It‚Äôs well worth the cost of the app!!!
Two major issues, no ability to filter by length or to save sites you like. Overall it‚Äôs OK.

I have the all stays all inclusive  for over 10 years. Looks like this one has gone the direction like the others to push out standalone users of this app, and force membership.

I‚Äôm pretty sure that‚Äôs illegal. We‚Äôll find out.

I‚Äôve met the owner and I sure hope he would not do something like that.  I hope to hear back.

I love the ability to zoom in on one big map showing where campgrounds and facilities are located! Traveling in Oregon this has been extremely helpful so we can quickly plan where to head on our next adventure while we are literally driving down the road.
This is not worth $10 and free apps such as iOverlander or FreeRoam do a much better job.  I cannot believe anyone would charge $10 for this crap.

label_title: Overall good, wish we could mark favorites
review: We use this a lot when travelling and is an extensive app, but would love to be able to mark our favorites and those recommended by other people.

Show more of your mom & pops campgrounds.
Every place is getting bought out by big companies that pay GSams to highlight there.
This year camping has really exploited. Having a hard time finds spots without making weeks reservations.
I‚Äôm halfway full timer and it‚Äôs getting hard to find places .

label_title: This a must have app for those that travel full time
review: This app provides tons of information on all kinds of different places to stay. We travel in a motor coach. This gives reviews, places to fuel, Walmart‚Äôs as well as other information for travelers. Also works in Canada and Alaska. Worth every penny.

One of the best apps I‚Äôve ever purchased. Just did a run across the country and found every stay by using this app. Of all the locations we‚Äôve stayed at we have only had one that was a buzz and was over rated. Couldn‚Äôt imagine traveling without it.

label_title: Great app for finding places to sleep
review: I use this app all the time to find places to stop for the night. I don‚Äôt know what I would do with out it.
This app is my RV travel bible!  I use it to cross the country several times a year.

I travel often and this app has been so useful for me. It helps find gas stops, parking areas, dump stations, camp grounds and more. Seeing the user reviews helps me choose an area to camp. I'd suggest this for any camper that enjoys traveling.
We never plan ahead and this app gives tremendous confidence and results. We have over 50k miles on our trailer and many nights on the road. This app is used every day. Thanks
I thought this app would have a routing function so we can see what campgrounds are available from point A to point B. Disappointed. Unless I‚Äôm missing something
Very helpful! We recently traveled and needed one night stays to and from our destination. This was a lifesaver.

We just started using the paid app. We have found it to a valuable planning resource as well as a newly asset on the road. It has helped me find propane and Walmart‚Äôs etc. I also use it to cross reference my route planner. The reviews are helpful as well.
This app is a great find. It has pictures and information. Well worth the money!

label_title: AllStays is our go to app when we look for. Campground.
review:
Full-time RVers and whenever we are going to a new area, nearly all the time, we use AllStays as the initial app to hunt for sites.   Format is intuitive.   

There are many CGs not on AllStays and wish there was a way to have those added.

This app has saved me so much headache while long haul road tripping for work with my camper. I use it mostly for finding smaller independent campgrounds and truck stops for staying overnight. Wish it had a better more intuitive review system, though.

Love this app.  We took a 5000 mile trip and are wandering around the USA.  This is awesome for finding campsites and other necessities.  I bought the $9.99 version.  Best $10 bucks I‚Äôve ever spent.

I use this all the time. Not only for finding great campgrounds (public and private), but also places I can pull of the highway for the night without cost. I would urge people to communicate with the developer so that the data base can stay current.

We have had a travel trailer for a few years. We enjoy boondocking but found it difficult to locate free/cheap camping across many of the free apps. When planning our cross country, month long trip, and seeing many raving reviews from full timing even families on YouTube, I decided to make the purchase. This has been an invaluable tool during our journey. We have used the app mainly for free overnight parking, dump stations, locating BLM land and determining if roads to/from the BLM area were maintained and passable. The ability to submit your own experiences leverages crowdsourcing, which keeps the information up to date and accurate. I have submitted many reviews during our journey.
So far this has proved to be an excellent app.  Glad we got it.

This app is a lifesaver in a pinch. Tons of info well-organized once you get the hang of it. We spent 6 delightful days at a FREE place on a lake in Idaho that we'd never have found otherwise.  I just wish it were searchable by campground name; sometimes you know that but not the town.
We have been using the paid version for a couple of years as we travel the country in our Sprinter. This app is super accurate and makes life on the road a breeze.  Please keep up the good work !
Just paid for it. Once paid for, no info on if it‚Äôs a separate app?  When I do find it and put preferences in it, they‚Äôre not there when I go back. Not sure how to even use AllStays Pro. üò´

label_title: Not much different than using Google and Google Maps
review: Not sure why this app was $10 as it doesn‚Äôt have much value. Pretty much all the info is aggregated from Google anyway. The only thing it does differently as far as I can tell is gives you a campground icon on maps.
Highway turn outs and overnight parking data would be nice. Just ran the AlCan and could not find anyone that knew if I could overnight on the pullouts.

Have used this app since 2012. Over 100,000 miles of crisscrossing this beautiful country and Canada. Accurate 99% of the time. Comprehensive. Just fantastic easy links to directions, websites, and reviews.
Only disappointment is that I haven't been able to share the Android version of the app with anyone. Guess it's not supported anymore. We still have it on our phones but I do work off the IOS version most of the time. Also  seems that at one time, I could follow the location on the map by gps even without wifi connection on my iPad.
Always wanted to tell allstays how good this app is.
Basically this is my travel bible.

Have been using for years.  When you see a needed change (maybe a campground has changed its name, for instance) just send it in.  They will update it very quickly.  Could not imagine planning a trip without this app.
Great app

label_title: Does not have the features listed
review: Don‚Äôt waste your $$ on this - it doesn‚Äôt have any of the filtering features it claims to have
App I always use to search for RV camping.
Have used this app almost every day on the road, not only to find camping and parking spaces, but directions to Costco has, and dump sites. So helpful!

label_title: Let‚Äôs go south of the border! üåµüå¥
review: I love this app so much that my only suggestion would be to please add Mexican waypoints. I would love to see camp sites in Baja, Mexico!
I have been using this app since 2013 when we got our first RV. so easy to use and find sites at the last minute. I have recommended this to many people who are new at camping. Thanks
Additional $30.00 for pro version for inclines and bridge heights. They don‚Äôt tell you that.

We travel extensively and I depend on Allstay to guide me into remote towns and campgrounds. With a 44 foot RV we are careful about the roads and spaces we pull into. Allstay has been our lifesaver in numerous circumstances from the boondocks to the bustle of 8 lane highways of Chicago.
Great app easy to navigate

We used this in a cross country trip in 2014 and it was so helpful! Now we‚Äôre on our 2nd cross country trip using it and it has once again given us all we need to know about campgrounds, rest areas, and so much more! I really rely on the reviews of campgrounds to make my decision about where to stay. They have been right on so far!! The developer is very responsive to suggestions, corrections and additions! Thanks for this great app!!

I love this app!! It has everything a camper needs, and so easy to use. I would never go camping without it. I also purchased the Walmart app but found that I didn‚Äôt need it because Walmart is already on this app. What a great source of info while traveling. Thanks Allstays!!!

I am not happy with the new upgrade. Previously, the information window for RV parks and campgrounds would tell me size limits, if big rig friendly, and number of sites. That‚Äôs gone now, along with quick driving directions. Instead now I have to opt through the information window for a website or review site. Try that at 1 bar and 1x cell access and no internet. Good luck! I‚Äôve had to lower my 5 star rating to 2 stars. We‚Äôve used Camp & RV since forever, and I am SO disappointed in this change.

New review:
Why did you remove info on how many rv/truck parking sites available in a rest area? Now we don‚Äôt know if we can exit or not! Some rest areas are not suitable for our 40‚Äô motorhome. I want my old Camp & RV app back!!!
Awesome app.
We live full time in our RV and this is our go to for all places to stay, and also for gas and services. Makes this all practical
This app has saved me a lot of money.  Find the city / county campgrounds - cheaper, better! Also the ACE campgrounds are always good.
We have a RV and love to go places with it. This app is the best for finding great spots! We are so thankful for it. Keep up the good work!

label_title: Go to app for full timer w/ class A motor coach
review:
I rely on it:
For gas stops that will accommodate a 34‚Äô coach hauling a Jeep
To find campgrounds and free dispersed camping locations
To find RV dump stations
To avoid low clearance underpasses. 
To find overnight stay locations like Walmarts and rest areas.

The app launches:
Google Maps or Apple Maps with directions to your destination
Dials contact numbers
Launches websites

It‚Äôs a one stop shop for almost all my travel needs.
Love this app.  Great even sites
This is THE Go-To App.  I don‚Äôt know what RV life would be like without it.  A MUST-HAVE.
I prefer the old way of providing information about a campground or other identifiers.
Best I have found to locate campgrounds any in USA.
Many of the free campsites and areas to dry camp are not listed on this app, and much of the dump info they give in the app is inaccurate.  Sorry I bought this app, better free apps are out there.
Pocket access to lots of information. Winner winner chicken dinner

As a person traveling around the USA full time in my 5th wheel I use this app a lot and I like it but I want to love it and I can‚Äôt, here‚Äôs why. Although the app has the potential to be great there are several really annoying issues with it; the app freezes up fairly regularly and is so frustrating. The amenities setting that allow you to filter your choices based on your needs has to be reset every time you use the app, it would make life so much easier if they made them ‚Äústicky‚Äù settings so that you only change them when your needs change. You can only find campgrounds by city and I don‚Äôt always know what city we‚Äôll be in or how to spell it if it had a region finder that would help tremendously and finally there is no way to save your selections if you are choosing between a few different campgrounds, the ability do do that would also help a lot. So it is a very useful app but it needs some improvements to make it great, upgrade it with the improvements and I‚Äôd be willing to pay up to $10.00 for it.
Great APP we use it all the time when we are traveling.

label_title: Finally a one stop camping app!
review: I love this app. Not just because it lists every campsite, park, Walmart, rest stop, etc. but because it tells me how far away they are from where I am locate right now.  Gas stops are easy to plan too.  No more going through 4 different books and 3 different to find a place to stop! Best app for small amount of money!

I‚Äôve used many apps to find the best places to stay, but now I only use this one. It gives me every possible choice for boondocking or RV Parking, and the defaults narrow my choices. It‚Äôs easy, fast, and gives me the info I need.
We use this app for every trip and it is the most reliable.  It provides all the information needed plus you can get directions from your location to the campground.  Best app ever!

Been using this app for the past couple of years now, and simply cannot imagine not having it. We use it extensively at home to plan trips, and do ‚Äúwhat if‚Äù scenarios. And we use it on the road to find propane, dump stations, Cracker Barrel or WalMart stores, etc. Absolutely invaluable!

We use this app for all of our traveling needs. Whether it‚Äôs a place to stay, fuel, propane, groceries this app works great!
That being said, we have found mileage to be off the mark of true travel distance. 
We check our travel distances off of google maps rather than AllStays.
My go to app for #vanlife travel. Always helps navigate us to where we need to stop or even find supplies.

label_title: Must have for RV‚Äôer, camper, or traveler‚Ä¶
review:
Must have for RV‚Äôer, camper, or traveler.  There are so many resources available on this app that anyone traveling can find useful.  I personally use this for RV‚Äôing/Camping and use it for planning purposes.  I can find all sorts of camping locations from private to government locations.  To supplement my planning, I can find potential rest stops, gas stations, and most importantly potential hill grades and low bridges since I tow a travel trailer.

The application is intuitive to use and many filters to help keep the maps clean and easy to read.  I use this primarily on my iPad for planning on iPhone when traveling.  The campsite reviews are good, but I don‚Äôt know necessarily where the reviews are from AllStays or from another source. I use other site reviews once I find a location on this app.  

I would highly recommend this application.
Just returned from a 7417 mile trip in my RV -Class B.  Used app dailey!  Love it!!
Great app but much prefer the look and layout on the old pages for each campground, otherwise it‚Äôd be 5 stars.

After latest upgrade my XGPS150-360AE1 is no longer recognized by the app. GPS works with other apps. Please fix it as this is my primary app for finding campgrounds on the road. It always says we are in the middle of the Atlantic of first southeast Africa.

When we  travel with our RV we do not have a plan.  We use this ap to seek our next stop and reserve if needed.
Happy Camper

I am using an iPad mini 4. In filters, I chose Thousand Trails, and Good Same. When I go tothe map, nothing shows. I can zoom all the way in or all the way out with all points in between. Nothing shows. I know there are several TT campgrounds and many Good Sam campgrounds but not a single one shows. And NOTHING else is chosen in filters. Not very useful to find a campground., Today, I ONLY checked Thousand Trails and if I zoomed in enough, it showed the two campgrounds in Ohio. I then added Low Clearance, went back to the map, and NOTHING showed. Very cumbersome to use and not very helpful. I did get a comment from APP support. Basically YADA YADA YADA try only one filter at a time. By clicking TT AND Low Pass, it will ONLY show TT that are ALSO Low Pass. How freakin useless is that?  So, it gets a 1 for useful only because nothing lower is allowed.
I was hoping to get other functionality with this app. Like saving reservations dates and times. Trip planning and adding stops etc

We used this App for over two years of full time RV travel around the USA and Canada. Allstays is an excellent source and replaced our paper books.  The RV-Military Allstays version was very helpful. For $9.99 it‚Äôs an incredible buy.

Great APP for travelers. We used this app to find RV Parks, campgrounds, and overnight parking as first time RVers and found it to be accurate and informative. We use it all the time. Like that we‚Äôre able to give feedback on the sites we used based on AllStays information. I‚Äôd recommend this app to anyone wanting camping information. We travel in a 34‚Äô travel trailer and finding spots to accommodate our RV‚Äôs length was easy using this app.

If you‚Äôre traveling the US in an RV or even just sleeping in your car, this is THE app you need. For 10 dollars one-time, it‚Äôs a pretty good deal too. 

This app has information about Walmarts, truck stops, campgrounds, and even Cracker Barrel‚Äôs. Most places have comments from previous travelers which gives you more context for each place. Can‚Äôt recommend this app enough.

I expected more.  How is this helpful?  I want to plan a trip but can‚Äôt see the route in the app.  I do like some of the features, but for planning it needs work. Send to maps is also not working for me.  How can I use the low clearance locations if I am sent to another app?

label_title: My Go To App for camping
review: This App (purchased version) is my first stop when looking for a site.  Very easy to use with lots of good info.
I use it regularly.

Why did you ruin your app with an ‚Äòupgrade‚Äô? It used to give a concise/brief description of the RV parks as to ‚ÄòBig Rig Capable, 50 amp service, etc‚Äô without having to go to the RV park website.

Now you force that to happen. Much less efficient and user friendly.

Very disappointed.

By the way, you need to change the visuals on your app download page since you don‚Äôt get that information anymore.

We‚Äôve been using AllStays for several years now. Everyone we meet, we show them this app. Great sorting capabilities and the info is top notch. I plan our trips using this app as the primary source. We have updated some info to their site. Best resource we use.
Simply put, this site will help guide you to find haven from the road!

label_title: Best app for your traveling needs
review: Our ‚Äúgo to‚Äù app for campsites, fueling, etc.  So happy we found this app before we began full timing almost two years ago.  It‚Äôs our number one reference!

I only have 7,500 miles on my odometer but I‚Äôve only made reservations at my destinations.  The rest of the time I drive until I‚Äôm tired or see an interesting place. That‚Äôs when All Stays is is invaluable.  I highly recommend it,

We love how All Stays APP helps us discover and compare places along our planned or unplanned route. We‚Äôve used it for over 5 years and can‚Äôt imagine planning or traveling without it. It frees us from needing piles of reference books and maps which were frustrating because they never showed the full range options which All Stays shows. Abundant thanks to All Stays for many memorable nights in unexpected places off the beaten path.

I retired 5 years ago and made the move to full time rv‚Äôer.  During this time I have been using the paid full version of the Camp & RV app. This app is such a part of my like style I would be lost without it. No matter where I am I am always able to find a place to park and spend a night or longer. The information is great and it goes a step further by linking to websites and online reviews.
Used it all last year, and already started using it this year.

Their latest set of updates made the user interface for searching absolutely terrible.   They should have left things alone and only updated locations.  I guess someone wanted to justify their existence- badly.

Before the update this was a great app.  It was extremely useful for finding campsites and places to stop along the way.
Use the paid app for our travel in a class A. So helpful and well worth the price of the app!

We‚Äôve used the Allstays App for 5 years now and it‚Äôs been a life line for us!  We full-time travel in a motorhome-home is where we park-so knowing where to stop is crucial.  We do most of our travels and stops as we go, not much planning.  Ya know, you got us thru Yellowstone National Park, much of Wyoming and much of Montana last summer during the busiest tourist season ever!  Seriously, you‚Äôve gotten us around the US a few times now!  Allstays has helped us find the best places to camp even if it was a Walmart.  The outline or synopsis of each place helps tremendously with details as hookups, length of rig, pullthrus, etc.  I like being able to see the reviews, hadnmt found them in the past. I‚Äôm adjusting to the new format-really liked the original so still adjusting. Very pleased.  Absolutely the best App for our lifestyle.  Thank You. ‚ù§Ô∏è. 
p.s. we share this app with everybody!

label_title: Extremely limited for a pay for app
review:
I found this App very limited and not worth the money. 

-Their search was cumbersome with no going back. To start a new search I had to exit then re-enter the app. 

-There are no settings 

-Have to set filters every time

-The reviews of places on the map on the app were few to non-existent 

-No direction were provided in the app itself, however, it did send you to other mapping apps

-We traveled the southeastern US from New Orleans, LA to Washington, DC and back by a different route for two weeks. We stopped at many campgrounds along our route. I bought this to help find campgrounds. I was extremely disappointed. This app didn‚Äôt show most of the campgrounds where we stayed. This app didn‚Äôt have information on so many campgrounds. Very, very disappointing. 

-This app worked well, not great, at finding truck stops that were RV friendly. It did not help us to find regular gas stations that were RV friendly. 

-The only restaurants it showed were Cracker Barrel‚Äôs.  Not all of these are easy access or friendly. They also are monotonous.

This app was amazing and made selecting a camp site so easy BEFORE THEY UPDATED IT. Since the update the features that made it so helpful (such as; if campground does tenting or takes RV‚Äôs and up to what size of RV.) have been removed from the  Pop-up info box on the main map screen. Now it is very hard to find this info.

For the last 5 years I have used this app everyday while traveling full-time. All the information you need in one convenient easy to use app! Seriously my most favorite AND valuable app. I LIVE by this app!! Thanks to the developers for making my travels so easy! üëçüëç
The search feature just doesn‚Äôt work. Put in Mesa, AZ and get no results. Yet if you find it on the map you will see plenty. The search is the MOST important feature and it doesn‚Äôt work.

label_title: Not worth the money for me
review: Don‚Äôt waste your money if you prefer boondocking/dispersed camping.
I appreciate the ability to go anywhere on the map and find information about camping or traveling.  This website is the best.
It‚Äôs a must have for rvers
Easy to use , use it for traveling to find places for overnight stay.
This app is great. It has all the information you need to pick a campsite to make a informed decision.  It‚Äôs accurate. I use it coast to coast.
This app is a trick so you will buy the pro app the app is junk without the pro app literally going to cost you $40 a year
I have a bunch of them, this the one I use the most.

This app WAS my favorite app until the last major software change.  It was easy to see a synopsis of a park at the touch of a button. label_title: Seems like a great app, but...
review: I want to love this app but I can't get full use out of it since the only map layer it will load is the satellite. I want to use it with the default map but all I get is a blank white grid. Icons still show up but kinda hard to determine where they actually are with no map.

I am a beginner RV‚Äôer without experience in camping.  AllStays has made the chore of finding camp grounds in areas we plan to travel much easier.  I also have a 44 ft long RV, that is 13 1/2 ft. tall.  It lets me know what camp grounds will take my RV length and let me avoid over passes that could damage our coach.  It also has pertinent information like campground phone numbers, and ratings of the campgrounds. The only drawback is, it isn‚Äôt able to be use as a trip planner, like APPLE MAPS or Google Maps.

Last year we traveled around Canada East and US New England.
In some removed area, we cannot find cell signal, so google map can‚Äôt work, but this map works in detail and works very accurately, amazing!
Best app for RV life.  Reviews are so helpful. My go to app for sure.

Easily understood and amazing in what it can do!
Terry 
March, 2019

I use this app quite a bit. We are a travel softball family, and I use the map and reviews on here to find the best spot near a ball tournament as possible. It has yet to let me down!! A ton of information and solid links to the actual campground web sites. I recommend you down load it if you have not already!

This is the best for campground info
The only thing lacking is road mapping , I have to use another app to map my routes and AllStays to find campgrounds along the route
We are full timing in our RV and it‚Äôs our main go-to app!
Been using this app for years! Travel in a 35 ft MH towing. So far it has not steered us wrong ever !
We love this app, we have used others, but always come back to Allstays.

label_title: A must have app for RV travel.
review:
App is great no doubt.  

Two improvements that would make make the app perfect:

1.  Map should move with your travel. Currently it lets you drive right of the edge of the map display. 

2.  Save filters.

Allstays is a great tool for planning a trip to an unfamiliar area. It‚Äôs great that it shows ALL types of campgrounds, rest stops and fuel.  It can be a bit difficult to learn to use but once you do it‚Äôs pretty invaluable.
Absolutely, definitively, without question the best camping app ever made. We use it constantly; it‚Äôs accurate, informative and indispensable. Love it and can‚Äôt imagine doing without it.
This is the first place I go to start searching for a place to stay.

I purchased this app for planning an extended motorhome trip which we just completed. It more than paid for itself just by provided easy over night alternatives to expensive RV parks. When we had to change plans, I had all important info right at my fingertips, including repair shops, refueling places and prices, free/cheap places to stay, nice places to stay, shopping, etc. When our GPS chose to go loco, I simply followed my All Stay maps and never went wrong. My only complaint is that conditions on secondary roads aren't specified as they are on the major routes. That info lets us know which routes are best avoided in a motor-coach. I highly recommend this app.

This app is essentially a collection of links to websites (e.g., private and public campgrounds). So, why bother buying this it when you can scour the internet for these links yourself. The reason is that all of those thousands of links are conveniently compiled in a very intuitive way making it breeze to use. I buy very few apps; this one is worth the money
I use this app all the time to find camping destinations.  Filter on the app is very nice.  You can chose everything from National Parks to a gas station.  Highly recommend.
Updated the app and now it's slow, the search doesn't work. Was a great app now just ok. Have to do more work to find the site needed. When an app is working great, why mess with it?
We have used this app for 6 months and have found it to help where ever we are.

I rely on this app every time we take the motor home on the road!  It hasn‚Äôt let me down yet. I love that you can access it even when no internet connection is available!  Also love the convenient links to the campground‚Äôs websites when you do have internet.  The low clearance warnings have saved me more than once, and the access to Walmart‚Äôs and other places of business is a big plus as well!  Highly recommended!

We use this not only to plan but during our travels with a 43 ft 5th wheel. I used this app to plan a 5300 mile trip out west and not only did it work perfect but was accurate. So useful and resourceful. Thankful for this app.

It is the best for looking at travel destinations. It is also awesome because you can look at all the roads when you are stuck in traffic from a wreck and figure out how to get around the traffic and get on your way.
Don‚Äôt like the updated version. Doesn‚Äôt show as much info and is difficult to navigate

label_title: One of the best apps I have ever purchased
review: So very useful if you are a full time RVer.   My wife and I where on the road for two months and this is the only app we used to find what we needed.
Excellent travelled USA on it never
Love this app
Bee careful if you are searching away from your current location.  This app will snap back to your current location without warning. I have no idea how or why this happens.  It is very frustrating.
This app has saved my butt so many times I can‚Äôt count! Driver says, ‚ÄúWhere‚Äôs my next diesel/pilot/rest stop, etc.‚Äù and I‚Äôm all over it! We use it on all our travels, towing or not
Great!

What happened to the features where you could do a search for only what you needed to find? For example, truck stops that are RV friendly. Now you have to sort through all gas stations and everything else on the screen to find truck stops. Whom ever designed this change has NO IDEA what it‚Äôs like to drive an RV on the road!
This App is top notch. We couldn‚Äôt plan our RV trips without it. We really like the integration with Google Maps and Waze.
This app has been very helpful when traveling. ..... or just dreaming of camping üòÑ
This is our fourth year with Allstays. Don‚Äôt leave home without it. No WiFi? - it‚Äôs still at your service. All the info you need to plan ahead or to help you today on your way.
Very reliable app.  I use it for finding camp grounds and locating Walmart parking lots to sleep in.  It has always been very helpful.

label_title: Very disappointed you no longer support Android devices
review: Very disappointed you no longer support Android devices... after I paid for both versions.

The old version was easy to use! I could touch on state parks in a state and they all appeared on a map! Now they are listed by towns! Does not work for me!

AllStay became my trusted go-to app while traveling across the country last spring.  I really like that it integrates many different RV park types, military, commercial, state and federal.  I would like a category for transitional parks that are converting to stick built homes, like we found in Arizona.  Also a category for parks that cater to seasonal or weekly rentals.  Some of those parks I would like to know to avoid.

label_title: The BEST app for camping and traveling information!
review: I have been using this app (the paid version) for full-time travels in my Class B camper van for several years now. It‚Äôs absolutely the most comprehensive, and most importantly ACCURATE, source of information on campsites, roadside rest areas, RV dump stations, and so much, much more! I have provided reviews, feedback, corrections, updates and additional information for many locations. Sometimes the app developer has contacted me to confirm details of my submission in order to ensure he gives his users the absolute best and most complete information. I have also tried some of the other similar popular apps. While they have some nice features that are appealing, I consistently over the past few years find their data MUCH LESS accurate, reliable or useful. I always return to this app, and consider it the ‚Äúgold standard‚Äù by which to judge all the other flashy but less reliable wanna be apps. You simply won‚Äôt find a more accurate or better supported set of absolutely useful and reliable data than in this app.
Has just about everything you could ask for.  We‚Äôll be using this app a lot.
Use it for trip planning.  I have found all my campgrounds using the app. A must have for RVers. Pick an area, use the filter, find your next camp.

label_title: Best app ever!  Just needs some minor tweaks.
review: This is my favorite app. We‚Äôre full time RVers and when you‚Äôre on the road you can follow your path in this app. Better than the map apps for that by far. You can view everything along the way including RV parks, state and national campgrounds, places to dry camp, dump stations, Walmarts, and so much more. Also shows steep grades and low clearances. I use it many times a day. LOVE IT!!  Wish I could highlight favorite campgrounds with personal notes attached. Also noticed campgrounds missing from the app but that should resolve itself in time as new ones get added. Well worth the $9.99 I paid for it!!
It‚Äôs nice to go to one place to find what I need!!!
I belong to different clubs, but I like coming here first to get an idea of the different parks in the area.
Outstanding app very useful
Has improved our ability to find camping spots, plan fuel stops and LP.
Good site, easy to use

This is the best app for RVing or camping I have come across. We recently travelled all over the western states, using this app to determine where to stay. At one point there were four strangers in an RV park office, checking in, and ALL of us had used AllStays to find it. Our conversation would have made a great promo for the app.

label_title: Wonderful resource for van and camping materials
review: This far everything we have needed to find for either camping supplies, van or chassis supplies or tire repair has been found via this app.  Outstanding!   I‚Äôm a user of Apple but sure wish this was available for the non-apple world. The latter is the o KY reason I am rating it a 4, otherwise it would be a 5.

label_title: I don‚Äôt know what I‚Äôd do without this app!!!
review: We travel a lot in our Rv and I rely on this app to find almost all our campgrounds. Love it!

We travel about 14 weeks a year in a 25‚Äô motorhome. We go without reservations most of the time and make them just prior to arriving so that we are not locked in any particular schedule.  It isn‚Äôt perfect with all campsites but 90% are there and the rating information is very close to accurate.  We could not travel without AllStays.
While traveling anywhere with my camper I rely on this app all the time. It‚Äôs always right with useful information about camp site. I find the reviews are helpful also.
This app is so handy, love the filtets. Easy to use. Couldn‚Äôt ask for more.
I use this app a lot to plan our trips. The map feature is wonderful and makes planning a breeze.

Love this app..use it pretty much exclusively- only reason didn‚Äôt give five stars is the filter..instead of the option for ‚Äúhas to have all‚Äù, would like for it to allow using some of the filters, use some, not necessarily all..

Very great app but could use some small refinements.  I would really like to see a ‚Äúfavorite‚Äù or ‚Äúliked‚Äù feature to save camp sites.  I also would like to see routes that are able to avoid bridges with a minimum height. Also, pairing with apps like campground views.com could give tours of campsites.
Thanks, Allstays. This app is my go to when traveling or planning a trip.
