We downloaded this app upon a recommendation from a fellow RVing friend and have no regrets. This site is extremely helpful when we‚Äôre looking for a campsite while traveling and their connected sites enable making reservations easy. Love the low clearance and store locations too. Overall a great site and we would give it a high recommendation.
I use this app all the time!!!

5th year using this app and we consider it the most important tool we have for travel planning and on the fly decision making. I‚Äôve tried all the others and each lacks the consistency and detail of this app. I'm hoping this app will incorporate route route planning in future releases.
I use this App all the time when traveling everything works great

Use it all the time. Wish you would designate RV parks that are Passport America. I find them on All Stay and then go see if they are on Passport America....(:  I also love you list all different types of parks. Thanks!

label_title: No longer compatible with recreation.gov site. Needs update to the built in browser.
review: Good for finding sites but can not use to make reservations.
This app is my first choice when looking for campgrounds. Better than the others in my opinion.
It‚Äôs a great app but recent changes are a big step backwards, as far as being able to set filters before choosing a state.

We enjoyed this app until it was ‚Äúupgraded‚Äù and forced its users to purchase even more in order to use any of its filters etc. I‚Äôve already purchased the app once, I won‚Äôt be purchasing any of these ‚Äúextras‚Äù they stripped us from with the first purchase. Bad business in my opinion.

The biggest issue is missing RV parks - lots of them. You‚Äôll want to use this in conjunction with other tools to check out all the options for the area you are researching. A simple Google search for ‚Äúrv parks near me‚Äù or specify a search for RV Parks by city or county, will always find additional parks with reviews, website links and contact information.
We‚Äôve been traveling around the country for the last 7 months. This app is indispensable for anyone RV‚Äôing. It shows everything you could need while on the road.
Not perfect but the best RVing app we‚Äôve ever used. We RV full time since 2015.
The only source we ever use for finding campgrounds - love it!

This used to be a great app, but the UI was changed in a recent revision and its usefulness is degraded.

Still the information is useful to us even though it‚Äôs no longer the standout product it once was.

I‚Äôve been a traveling Scrub for a long time. Having an Rv is a huge help. But when it comes to finding great places and good rates, nothing beats this app for me. It‚Äôs especially helpful when I am heading to a tourist spot. I can find places off the beaten path that‚Äôs safe and quiet! When making travel plans I can use this to find gas station and places to stop for the night. Many Walmart‚Äôs no longer allow that, so it‚Äôs nice to have the info before hand.
Allstays app is great. Have used it for three years now and love it.
Our go to app. that we use on planning our trip and when in route.  We use the filter to help us locate specific needs as we travel.  Recommended to anyone who travels.

label_title: Hate the new look of the app
review: I used to love this app. Super intuitive to use and book sites. Now that they have updated it it‚Äôs extremely hard to navigate and very clumsy. Bring back the old look!!! 5 star before frustrating as hell now.
Was a great app they change it can‚Äôt find the information I always used to find general areas. To find area I wanted to look at.

label_title: Love the app, one suggestion make a favorites option
review: This was an expensive app for iPhone but very good. One thing I wish they would add is a favorites option to save for later.

label_title: This is the best one there is.
review: We use this app daily.  We travel more than six months a year. This is the best app there is. I have tried several others and this one just works the best.

label_title: Great app for planning a road trip.
review: Great for planning road trips. You can route from campground to campground to see how long of a drive it will be.
First time RVing, very confusing to use....wished I hadn‚Äôt bought.  ü•∫

I am pretty sure I have every location app for RV, camping, Boondocking etc I can say with confidence all you need is this one app. It even has BLM land. It‚Äôs unbelievable and I would gladly have paid or triple for it!

I just upgraded to the latest version. It did take just a little time to get used to it but, I assure you, it is better than ever. I van camp as a hobby and I love all of the out-of-the-way places that the app shows me that I never seen before. If you have any inkling that you might benefit from the app, just go ahead and buy it and start using it. Example- I like cheap gas and am a Costco member. The app shows me every Costco in the US with just a couple keystrokes.
This is a must for any type traveler.

I use the Allstays app religiously. It is the best site to find campgrounds around the country. Unfortunately, their new upgrade blocks access to user reviews from other sites. It also blocks the ability to post reviews on other sites. What made this app so good before was that you could read (and post) reviews on several apps, thereby giving you a wider picture of user remarks. Limiting everything to Allstays only is like throwing blinders on.

We travel for weeks at a time, and have used this several dozen times to find parks & services. Occasionally a park is missing, but that is what update functions are for. Overall, this is an indispensable tool for the traveler/camper and the absolute best of the seven or eight apps we have tried.

This app has been our go to source on two major trips. It has never let us down. Just got the new revised updated format. Looks to be more straight forward with respect to reviews. The icon road map is terrific!
Planning our next trip right after I submit this.

label_title: Our Go-to Resource for RV Travel
review: Camp and RV has it all. We use C&RV constantly for finding campgrounds near our route or just places to park overnight. The information provided has been accurate, campground and Walmart reviews are very helpful.  This is a very user friendly app.

We just finished a five week trip from the Midwest to the west coast and back and used All stays everyday. Great information that was very accurate, we love this app!!!!!  Can't imagine traveling without it and worth every penny.
This is the best resource we have found to find camping sites!  Use it multiple times on every trip - call phone # for red, look at pictures, etc.  Great app!
This app has been our life line to all RV parks, repair shop, where to purchase propane, RV supply,  I tell very new be about this tool.  Thanks

Easy setup, easy to use, and beats the livin‚Äô daylights out of that $500 plus dollar Garmin RV I bought. I may send a thank you note to the thieves who took it out of my car. It‚Äôs a positively terrific app.
Been using this to book all our stays! Love it!
Best $$ spent on an app!  Love the new update also.  So helpful finding campgrounds that will work for us.  Also the fuel info is very helpful.  Can‚Äôt say enough!
This is the one every traveler must have. It has it all, easy to use, accurate and provides a amazing amount of information. Don‚Äôt leave home without it.

label_title: I don‚Äôt understand the 5 star reviews
review: This app was a total waste of my money. The interface is difficult to use and doesn‚Äôt show nearly all of the campgrounds that exist. Super upset I spent ten dollars on it

I love this app for looking for campsite.  A lot of the data is built into the app so even if you lose cell service you can still look for places close by and even still get the info on the place like GPS coordinates or phone numbers.

There is much more to this app but it is very well designed and easy to use.  I do wish something could be done able the limited zoom area size if too many things being shown.  A grouping of the items would be nice and then expands out as you zoom in.

But over all this is my primary Camping planning app.
Why did you take the summary of the location away?  I counted on knowing how many campsites, big rig friendly, pull thrus, etc. plus knowing RV lanes in gas station. Will REALLY miss the summary.
The reviews are old.  The app has gone down hill for awhile.  Notice there are no new reviews.  Use to love this app.  Wish it would be back to where it was.
I teach this app for my beginning RV class. The quantity and quality of information is the best. My students love the ease of use and what the app does to assist them with their travel planning.
Been traveling in my RV this app is great.  It lets you know wat is available in the target area

A fellow RV camper suggested Allstays a few days into our vacation last month, and we are so glad he did. We used the app every single day - to find RV parks, laundromats, grocery stores, diesel gas, propane........just about anything we needed. How did we ever manage before Allstays?

This is a great app ! I use it in our RV, tent camping & motorcycling. It is very complete- lots of good & accurate information plus very easy to use. I have recommended this app to many fellow travelers & always tell camp/park hosts how I found them. It is being consistently upgraded- definitely worth the purchase price !
I love this app!  I am a full time Rver, and it is my go to for finding my next park!
I use this app all the time while traveling. Everything from fuel to overnight parking to planning a long weekend

My husband and I have been full timing for the past few years. Allstays has been our main campsite locator. It‚Äôs easy to use, up to date, comprehensive and accurate. The only thing that would make it better would be the ability to filter by RV size. Even without that it‚Äôs well worth the money.

We love this app! New update is great!
We are retired and are full time RVers, have using this app for 3 years, best app ever!

This was my go-to app for campgrounds. I hadn't used it recently, but when I tried today it is basically useless. The campgrounds won't load to their website, it freezes up, and closes. I think it had a recent upgrade, and now it's ruined.  NOOOOOO!
This app is great for traveling across the States.  Love the filters to pinpoint what your needs are.
This app has saved us from having to camp at Walmart.  We use this every day when on the road.

I love this app. We were able to travel from PA to CA and back using this app, almost exclusively, to find new sites. We stayed anywhere from 1 to 4 nights over 7 weeks of traveling with our 17 ft trailer. I did find the mileage was lower than when transferring to a map for directions. It was easy to adjust for this difference. I loved the links to the websites and reservations, as well as the links for reviews and weather. I have recommended it many times during our trip.
We‚Äôre full-timers, and this is the app that makes it possible. I am always recommending this app to anyone who needs to know where to find good camper spots. Priceless!
My go to app for finding campgrounds along our route.  Lots of info in the database.  Filtering makes it easy to find the kind of camping you are looking for.  Direct link to park reviews.

label_title: Saved my RV and a headache
review:
Going to visit Zion national park.  Thought I had a route planned until I looked for a campground in the area on this app and saw low clearance issues on the route I was planning to take.   How could I have possibly turned around a 39 ft fifth wheel on the narrow hilly roads around Zion NP?

This app saved me and I didn‚Äôt even know clearances were an issue in the area!

E. H.
Nice app with tons of options when looking for a CG. Accurate and reliable. Would rate 5 stars if allowed users to save favorites.
I used this almost daily on an extended trip and recommend it highly
We have been using All Stays app for a year now.  It is an excellent tool to find whatever you need campgrounds, resorts, gas, shopping etc... It has always been accurate for us.
Great app. Has helped us find a place to stop for the night many times when we are tired and just can‚Äôt drive any longer. Very accurate information, hasn‚Äôt steered us wrong yet!

label_title: No longer works with 12.0 iOS update
review:
Every time I try to use it says:
404 page not found. It will no go to our reservation.

Promised to be comprehensive but it is so difficult to manage. And the icons on the map are SO small on my phone I can barely see them. Also often I will be in an area that Good San App says there are so many campgrounds and I look at this app and it shows nothing. Even if I click things for my filter, they aren‚Äôt there the next time I open the app. I have to check them each time. I mostly got this for the list of Walmarts that might allow you to use their parking lot with permission. Very nice on a rainy late night when I‚Äôm nowhere near a campground. It worked once. I have had the best luck with Good Sam. Sorry I wasted my $10.

This app attempts to provide information on low clearances.  I find it seriously lacking in this regard, particularly in New York and New England.   I have submitted information for updates in Washington and Oregon that we‚Äôre lacking but there are so many in the Northeast that it‚Äôs overwhelming.  I spend all my time detouring around them so that submitting suggestions is beyond me.  The app is clearly based on user-submitted input rather than legally posted limits.
Good planning app but the map is not compatible with car-play and that‚Äôs a major bummer.

This is my go to app for our RV trips. I like the customer reviews of the RV parks. Also the pictures people put in their reviews. It‚Äôs amazing the difference customer pictures vs the pictures the park posts.

We just finished a 10k mile road trip through the USA and Canada. This app is our first stop when we‚Äôre planning our travel day. It would be a slam dunk 5 Star if it was a little more intuitive as you maneuver in it.
I love this app and tho‚Äô I have other RV apps, this one is the best. I pretty much use it exclusively- I‚Äôve been full time for 8 years and pull a 30‚Äô tt.
No more stack of books. This app is all you need.
Love this app

Absolutely crazy ugly interface, not optimized for iPhone X, useless search feature. Works only with active internet connection (aka problematic on a road trip). I have no idea why people love this app - maybe I just dont get it :/
This is a great site and helped us travel 5420 miles this summer. I relied on it totally. Even worked in Canada!!
We love this app!  Gives you all the info you need to know to find a campsite.  I use it even when we are just traveling and not camping to locate restaurants and rest areas along our route.

You enter the name of a RV park you wish to view and after that there‚Äôs nothing to press to enter it ??   Won‚Äôt do anything it‚Äôs worthless?
Wish I had my $10 back
Love this app. Use it whenever we travel.

This app is great for finding a place to park for the night when your between destinations. Last night we stayed at a city park that had 6 RV spots in a small town in Kansas. If we didn‚Äôt have All Stays we would never known it was there.

label_title: New to RVing. Glad I found this.
review: We just got an RV and I came across this app while reading blogs. We have used it only a few times but loving it so far. It is easy to use and I have found the information to be up to date.
We've used this app for years. Wouldn't leave home without it.

As newbie RVers this App is fantastic!  Can really get loads of info very fast. Have used it to plan several trips and to find suitable gas stations along the way. Only thing I would love to see is some way to store or tab the campgrounds that you like or are considering for trip planning purposes. 

Great job overall!

Do you have the ‚ÄúAllstays‚Äù app? It‚Äôs the best search app I‚Äôve found for RV travel. It not only maps every campground (with details, contact info, reviews, etc), but waste stations, truck stops and way more. It‚Äôs free, but I broke down and bought the deluxe for a few bucks. Worth it!
Whenever I travel, this is all I need to plan my stops along the way, and the longer stays too. 
Check it out üòÅ

Just started using the app. Love it! My go to app for all my trips and planning of trips. I will be adding comments and reviews for all my stays (I would recommend you do the same this is what will add an added benefit to this app).

We use this app frequently as we travel with our RV. It is the best resource we have found for finding campgrounds and services. 
The search feature for geographic location needs work. It often does not recognize places or areas? We just use the map to find things.
Have used this app for a few years while traveling to unfamiliar places. The app has never failed me. Takes some getting used to, but what app doesn‚Äôt?
I use this app every time I have my camper in the rear view. It truly has been a valuable tool.
Easy to use and up to date reviews.

This app is NOT worth the money they charge.  
I bought it following some recommendations on YouTube, that was my first mistake. 
I use other free apps which a lot more information on campgrounds and way more reviews.
I would not recommend this app.

This app has saved us countless hours of worry and fret. When we feel like driving, We'd cruise along until we wanted to stop. Turn on the app, look for a nearby site, check reviews and call the best one to check availability. 
It also helps planning way ahead. Check the app long before your trip and plan out every stop along the way. You can tell so much about a campground by the reviews and their websites. It's also great for finding those little State & County Parks.

Easy to use!  I don‚Äôt usually buy APPs, but this was well worth the money.  Lots of helpful information for RVing. Information is up-to-date making it easy to look ahead while driving (someone else driving, of course!) for nearest truck stops and rest areas.  Love the satellite feature, so you can check accessibility for a larger rig towing a SUV.  Good for searching for RV parks before you leave too.  All around helpful APP!
Useful campsite info, but not easy to use. Lacking offline mode. And has annoying ad popups anytime you use it to make a call.

label_title: Terrible compared to other RV apps
review: I absolutely hate this app and hate that I paid 9.99 for it!  There is no way to search by name of campground and no favorite button.  Definitely does not compare or come close to other apps out there that are free.

We downloaded the app and have used it to locate places to stay for over 60 nights.  The information is accurate, complete and just what we need when we are on the road.  It‚Äôs our ‚Äúgo to‚Äù app when we travel.  Jim and Nonie of 2McDs

label_title: Incredible app and worth the money
review: I use this app exclusively to find campsites and have done so for the last 3 years. Well worth the money. I like it so much that my wife purchased it for her phone, and I recommend to all my camping friends.

label_title: Very useful when traveling in our 30 foot Thor motorhome.   easy to use and beneficial
review: A great app for campers.  user friendly and very up-to-date.

label_title: My Go To App for Camping
review: Thanks Allstays!  I just realized that I‚Äôve been relying on you for almost 5 years now and you‚Äôve never let me down.  Far and away the best app for searching Campground info and making reservation.  Good, up to date information, easy to use interface with options, and clear maps.  Always use Allstays!
I love this app!  I use it all the time searching RV Parks and also shopping.
All-in-one site to locate and find info on RV campgrounds anywhere.  It has been our go to site for years.

Seems like information isn‚Äôt added or updated until, all stays puts out an update to the app. Would like more fluid exchange of information between users. Other than that it‚Äôs kind of handy to use.
Definitely worth the money   A must have if you‚Äôre a regular camper

Maps of propane, overpass heights, dump stations, and of course campsites are super valuable. 

We just did a 2 week Canadian trip and exclusively picked locations based on user reviews from this app.  Each one was right on.
If you own a Motorhome you should not leave home without this app.
This is a great app to use which gives you a quick geographical view of the campsites.  Even the icons let you know up front what type of campground it is which saves a great amount of time.
A lot of webpage links don‚Äôt work. To look up campgrounds in the are app‚Äôs fine
I‚Äôm new to all this and this app is excellent. All the info you need to have a successful camping experience to ANYwhere you wanna go. A great tool!
May work for some, but for the occasional weekend camper it‚Äôs a hard app to use.
Type a search string in and click Done or the arrow icon and the search string is cleared - awesome. Now go to the map and scroll to find the area you are interested in - fail!
This is the only app I use when traveling. It tells you EVERYTHING you need to know.
We use this a lot when on the road. Hasn‚Äôt steered us wrong yet. Wish there were even more reviews of individual campgrounds/resorts.

label_title: Best RV app I have used
review: This is the best RV and camping app I have used. I use it to help me map out my next adventure. There is a wealth of knowledge to be gleaned from each and every very site. To me it is a must have app.
We are fulltimers and this our goto app.  We could not get on the road without this app and it work as it should, imagine that.

This is a great app and my 1st choice for RV travel. It has everything I need and is so simple and easy to use! 

The only thing missing is being able to save Favorites for future reference. Please add Favorites to the app!
Have used this many times.  Very satisfied. Saves time and money.  This app needs an internet connection and sometimes can be slow, but I wouldn‚Äôt travel without it.

I can‚Äôt imagine traveling in our RV without this app. We spent several months every winter traveling in our RV in the southern US. My husband likes to camp by 3 pm, so about 2 pm I go onto Allstays to start looking for a place to spend one night or several nights. I just check out different campgrounds coming up, some with full services, some for boondocking. I can almost always get enough accurate information to make a decision. We‚Äôve been using the app for about 4 years, and it works great!

I have been using All Stays app for a few years now, and it‚Äôs always been top of the line. Some hiccups here and there, but they do try to keep updated and useful information on the camping spots. Being able to find so much info on campgrounds, camping stores (or ones that are great for RV‚Äôs and camping supplies and food, etc.), RV dealerships, low clearance areas, road grades, and more, all in one app is amazing. Sure some of the sites might be outdated, closed, charge more than app says (even if it says it‚Äôs free), or not exactly in right spot, but this is a great app to find what you need without searching the internet for 30 minutes figuring out what you need. (Try finding a NFS campsite on the NFS website when you have no cell service.) One addition that would be awesome is a ‚Äúboondocking‚Äù section to the filter list, where people can submit a camping spot that might not be at an actual campground,  Walmart or truck stop. That would be the cherry on top for the app.
Loving this app, great accuracy and very addictive. Keep up the good work!

We have used the app to camp from California to Alaska, it even works through Canada! Each day while we are in an area with cellphone coverage I look up the town we are going to and it shows the camp sites. Then you can scroll along the route and find campgrounds all between your destinations. 
It has also helped us find free campsites at casinos, Cabelas & Walmarts. 
This app is well worth the money to purchase!
Great app with lots of info. Easy to use.
Not worth the price, need to find a dump site, this app found 3 - google found 5 and two were closer

We used this app exclusively on a 2 month trek across the country.  We did not have a plan or reservations (before hand) anywhere, but we always found a campground to stay in thanks to this app. We stayed at a lot of 1st come 1st serve campgrounds, but we were able to make reservations on the fly through this app. Tons of useful info and links. Hint: mileage between 2 points is by the crow fly & not by roads. Use your GPS for exact mileage. I actually never use the search feature, so I can‚Äôt tell you if that‚Äôs an issue.  I just use the map to scroll then pinch & zoom. Also, buy a Rand McNally atlas & follow the green dots! Happy Trails!

We‚Äôve been using this app for 3 or 4 years, and it‚Äôs been very helpful when planning a trip in areas we haven‚Äôt been before.  Even in locations that are somewhat familiar, it offers suggestions for RV service, propane etc.  I‚Äôve recommended this app to several others because of our experience.

label_title: Leaves much to be desired-save your money!
review: This app is not easy to navigate because it is not intuitive. Information about too many sites is incomplete, outdated; some positive reviews are exaggerated. It seems that a purpose of this app is to induce purchase of more of the company‚Äôs apps, which provide information that should be included in this app. I often found more useful information in a Google search, which is free. Once this app is  purchased, there is no obvious provision for canceling it for a refund. Be sure that you want it before purchasing this app. I haven‚Äôt found it to be worth the price.

label_title: Hands down best app to find great camping locations!
review: This is our 5th season camping in our RV and this is my GO TO app to map our journey.  Everything you need is right there in the app.  We use it to plan trips and while we are on the road.  Sometimes we want to drive 4 hours and this app will tell you all your options at that destination.  This app was well worth the nominal price for a 1 stop shop tool!

label_title: I like this app more than the others, but!
review: I use this app first before any other options but I go to Sturgis bike week and I‚Äôve noticed 4 campgrounds missing in just a 1 mile radius of each other, 1 being the infamous Buffalo Chip, 2nd is Creekside Campground, 3rd is the Bear Butte Creek Campground, and 4th is the Ride-N-Rest Campground, and that is just in a very small area, I now wonder how many other Campgrounds are missing in the vast amount of campgrounds in this app.
I use several resources to find campgrounds, but AllStays is my go to. The paid version of the phone app is well worth the reasonable price.

I have found this app is very helpful in finding adequate camping location with accommodation that we are looking for, (Lot size, hook ups (sewer, water, electricity amps). Campground accommodations (pool, putt-putt golf, cycle riding, pet friendly and etc.) Availability, contact information, outside resources, costs and dates. It is kept up-to-date pretty well. I am retired and use it a lot. I would highly recommend this app..

label_title: Data is great! Interface is a disaster!
review:
Used it for 4 years now. 

No progress has been made with the apps flaws. Initially I thought there was SOooo much promise. 

1. Offline maps disappear randomly. The maker says this can‚Äôt be fixed. 

2. Quite a few of the campgrounds in the West don't exist and never have. Some are not where the app says they are. Several BLM and USFS campgrounds particularly the free ones have been shut down for years. I think the app proved right about 80ish % when preferring free campgrounds. 

3. The $ symbols do not reflect the layers of other permits necessary to use many state, federal and local campgrounds. This has been particularly true for Washington State. 

5. I have yet to see a review for a campground that was associated with the app. I like this option, but really wish this was a functioning part of the app.
This app is the best I have found to locate all RV related businesses. Well done easy to use.
Indispensable for our travels in our Motorcoach! My first choice for finding places to stay.
This is my go to app for finding everything on our trips. Don‚Äôt leave Home without it.
Very good most of the times.  Locks up once in a while

We use this App,  and its Android cousin, almost every day.  Not 100% reliable about all features of every camping spot, but the best we have used.  I especially like the ‚ÄúOvernight Parking‚Äù places...some of these have been gems!!!  Curiously,  the database for Android and for IOS are not identical...we check both.
Very helpful! Helped us find a tire shop in an area that we were passing through. Helped us find all of your RV sites in Colorado. It‚Äôs worth the purchase $
Great!

label_title: Best tool ever for planning and traveling
review:
This app is the best thing since sliced bread. With the many filters it‚Äôs possible find the kind of campground that suits you and to plan routes keeping you and your rig safe. 
    The bridges filter is the best! Why waste time planning a scenic route only to find out the bridge you‚Äôre approaching is 12‚Äô but your rig is 12‚Äô-6‚Äù, with no easy way to turn around. Turn on the filters and plan your route, just that easy.
    Most of the sites listed in Allstays have hyperlinks that bring you to the reservation page of that campground. Take your time and learn the app, it‚Äôs worth the effort. 
    Between Allstays and a good quality RV GPS, I wouldn‚Äôt leave home without it.
ps.  Never depend on your cell phones as a GPS. Bite the bullet and get yourself a good RV GPS and use Allstays for all the planning.
Not worth the money, you can find better free apps. This app misses so many great campgrounds. GRR

label_title: Would never RV without this app.
review: Been using for a long time now. Got rid of my mountain passes book, my diesel stops book, and my giant campgrounds directory. I use the address info from this app to set a destination in my Garmin GPS before heading to the next campground.

label_title: Great for planning and on the road finding a place to camp
review: Easy to use and a must for rving

label_title: My ‚Äúgo to‚Äù camping trip planner and quick reference when we need to make a fast decision
review: Greats and accurate app for all aspects of camping: conceptualizing a trip, planning and reservations and quick reference for those inevitable days when plans change. The links provide ample information to support picking a site.

label_title: Best travel guide for RV travels!
review: We have used other apps, but this is the best we have found for all around information! It‚Äôs the only one we ever use now! Happy Travels! Teresa H., Ky

We love this app! We take our big plan and develop the details so simply using Allstays. Look about 200 miles ahead. Then expand the area, find campgrounds. Quickly evaluate the possibilities- hookups, big rig friendly, etc. Immediately look at satellite Google earth...zoom in, does that park appear appropriate for your rig?  Maybe...then BAM!  Click for website. Click for pictures of the area. Click for reviews. Click to call. 

Now, rinse and repeat for the next leg of your journey. Done?  Not quite...  Remember to review your route for bridge heights to keep those a/c units on your big rig where they belong!

Allstays Camp and RV simplifies our full time lifestyle. Absolutely our favorite rv app on the phone!  ~ ~ JD
This app has become an essential tool in our RV trip-planning! It is always timely and accurate, and includes accurate GPS coordinates for RV sites.
Doesn‚Äôt have several campgrounds on it

I‚Äôve logged a lot of miles in my RV and nobody gets it like Allstays. Whether in my 45‚Äô motorhome or pulling my 37‚Äô travel trailer, I need to know who can handle my rig or how to get there. (Ever come head to head with a low overpass? Allstays let‚Äôs you know what‚Äôs ahead.) Allstays has never let me down. All the info I need is right at my fingertips. You know just how valuable this app is when you‚Äôre out of cell range and can‚Äôt get to it! Keep up the great work Allstays.
Excellent app.  Love the mileage feature so I can tell how far the next stop is  No problems at all.

Great app with most of the information that you will need.  I find the USERS REVIEW to be invaluable. HOWEVER,  It is time to update their hybrid maps. I use the hybrid maps to provide a sense of how tight fueling options are for a motor coach pulling a toad.  They show facilities symbols but do not show any structures.  Have to go to Google Maps or Apple Maps to confirm structures.  It's a bit frustrating.  I know they are aware of the issue since they provided the last three sentences as a sample review. Come on, do something about it! Earn that fifth STAR
New park in Manistique, MI. Full hook ups, quiet , clean and just a perfect place to stay.

label_title: Issue with scrolling and selecting. Wish I didn‚Äôt pay for an app that doesn‚Äôt work very well
review: I love all this app has to offer, and I wanted it for my samsung phone but wasn‚Äôt able to since they don‚Äôt make it for Android .so I was excited when I got an iPad that I could download it. But for some reason I am having major issues with it. Sometimes it‚Äôs as though it‚Äôs not recognizing that I am touching the screen. I can‚Äôt search, can‚Äôt press any of the top menu options, sometimes I can‚Äôt zoom out or in, sometimes I can‚Äôt scroll to a new location. It just does nothing, like I‚Äôm not even touching the screen. I‚Äôve tried using my Apple Pencil too, and I‚Äôll have the same issue. I‚Äôm only upset because I paid for this app, and instead I‚Äôll be using my free ones more often.
I‚Äôve emailed with the author and he‚Äôs an ok, regular sort of guy.

label_title: This is my primary search tool
review: I‚Äôve found a few flaws that disturb me....the distance between points is significantly inaccurate and when I pointed out several errors on one RV site, all I got was an argument. Just a point to double check carefully the All Stays info against the actual info on the destination web site. The more I use All Stays, the better I get at it. I‚Äôve found that not entering a city, I can find more potential sites around and near my area of choice. I did find a park not in All Stays...so awful it wasn‚Äôt a place I‚Äôd ever stay...I wondered if there are criteria to be met to be included in the ap. I recommend this as one of several valuable tools in RV travel.

This is a wonderful app for planning RV trips and for finding places to stay when you are already on the road. We have found the information to be completely accurate. I appreciate the comments that people can leave about specific campgrounds or boon-docking sites. We stayed in a Cracker Barrel parking lot last year for our first time boon-docking on our way to our final destination in Florida. There were specific instructions on where to pull in and where to park for the night. It was great information! Everyone using this app knows how difficult it is to turn around your rig, especially in a smallish parking lot. We appreciate the app!

I‚Äôm giving 4 stars because I know it‚Äôs a great app!! The reason only 4 is because it‚Äôs hard to navigate with the search option.  It clears my info and it takes forever to get it to show the data I need. If someone knows what I need to do, feel free to let me know.

By far, this is the best RV & camping app out there. We are full-timers & rely on it for height clearances, as well as all the camping options, including National Park Service campgrounds, BLM spots, State Parks, Casinos, Overnight parking spots, Military campgrounds, Rest Areas, County Parks & so much more. Use the filters to show what's relevant for you. Then use the advanced filters to further refine by things like price, or parks that can accommodate RVs or only tents. I think this is the only app I ever paid for & its value to us is priceless.

With many sources to choose from, Allstays is the first place we check as we start planning for the next stay. We travel on the shoulder seasons and so almost never make advance reservations, but rather start looking after lunch for our most likely day‚Äôs destination. The website links are occasionally out of date, but the site reviews are good. Glad we are IOS based as they apparently no longer support Android.

label_title: Much better than the old-fashioned nook
review: Could never make it without this wonderful app. Everything in one spot - ratings, photos, maps and descriptions.
How can I use it for navigation like other maps, when I find a place I want to go it takes me to google maps. I want to navigate and see what is around me

This app has always been great, but with every update it gets even better! This is one of the best apps I have. I can see at a glance what campgounds there are in the area I am going to be in, and it does so much more than just campgrounds!  It's my" go-to" app when I want to find rest areas, Costco stores, fuel, and even an REI store. I use it as my default map now.

I got rid of my other camping apps. This is the best one. I have relied on it for years. 

From a 15 year full timer.
We just purchased this app and have used it for our last two camp outings. Very informative and accurate. Super detailed. I‚Äôd buy it over and over again
Great for all kinds of campgrounds!
It is a very great app. Did I mention it was great

Without a doubt the best camping app.  I have tried several others but none compare. Really like the ability to filter info in and out of the map, especially the low bridge warnings. You only have to get stuck on a road and have to back up once to understand the value.

I had this app for years and used it infrequently for years. With it‚Äôs updates and improvements it‚Äôs now my most used and go to app for quick information on the road. Keep growing and you may become my only travel app. Great job!

I have had the app for about 3 months and what I have used it for was great. You can explore camp grounds, then go directly to their web site.
 I had a couple of questions contact support and was responded to in a timely matter.

First and foremost, let me say that I find this app to be the best of its kind.  Extremely helpful and informative for those needing a place to sleep on the go.  I can tell that the app continues to improve and I find it to be one of my most crucial apps.  The only complaint?  UI/UX is abhorrent.  Dear Allstays, hire me to help you resolve this.  LOL...seriously, though.  Great app otherwise.

This is a multi purpose organization which includes a small Motel, storage facility and Laundry mat in addition to being a full hook-up RV Park. Cement pads with a majority being pull throughs. The only back-in sites are along the edge. These are also the only sites with any trees near by. No shade trees and no fire rings for the rest of the facility. Nice laundry facilities (we did not use). Small Shower house with a roll in shower for handicap use. (Did not use)
Staff is very friendly and accommodating. Our truck broke down and we needed a spot to park our TT so we could drop off the truck in another town. Even though we did not pick our trailer up until past the normal check out time the following day, they only charged for one day.

We use this app exclusively to plan our stops and to choose campgrounds or places to stay overnight.  Have been on the road for four months and haven't referred to anything else.  Love the way filters can be used to narrow down to exclude or include what and where we want.  Would like to see more reviews, but people like us are going to have to take the time to post them! We're as guilty as a lot of other people about not doing that, so perhaps a prompt in the program that asks "Where did you stay?...How did you like it?..." Could be 'accepted' or 'remind me later...' Or 'no thanks'.  All around, it's worth

Read all reviews though it would be good! Wrong. I can do the same thing on my google maps and I can map out my route on google maps, what you can‚Äôt do in this app. I would be going back and forth from google maps and this, then I realized they weren‚Äôt different. I didn‚Äôt need this extra map.

We like to travel without reservations. Reservations put a stress that we don‚Äôt want while traveling. This app has been a great resource while planning a trip but it has it is worth it weight in gold when you have a hiccup in your travels and you need to find a place to sleep. This app has lead me to some campgrounds I would have never found without it. Safe travels

This app has been amazingly helpful, especially when we go on long trips, traveling the country, and sometimes ‚Äúwing it‚Äù with our next destination.  Also, extremely helpful with finding places to overnight such as a Cracker Barrel lot that is RV friendly.

The only thing that I REALLY wish this app had is a way to save favorite campgrounds to a list so that when looking up options, campgrounds of interest can easily be located again.
We just bought our first RV, so we are newbies. This app has been so helpful. We use it all the time to plan our routes. Thank you for designing it.
I have used this app numerous times to find places to rest and stay!

label_title: All Stays best RVing App. Ever!
review:
We started RVing full time 5 months ago the same time we were introduced to All Stays by Brian and Susan Taylor from The UK who were traveling via RV through the United States. 

Like the Taylors we have found All Stays to be the most inclusive research tool to plan our great adventure. 

We are grateful, and delighted to share it with others. 

Thank you All Stays for such a great product. 

Debbi Allen and Raul Licon
Full Time RVers

This app was one of the biggest reasons my cross country road trip was such a success. It made finding a free place to sleep each night incredibly easy and was so helpful in planning out where we wanted to be in advance. This is the best money you‚Äôll ever spend on an app.
I have used this app for several years including trips thru Canada, Nova Scotia, and Alaska.  It has worked extremely well.
Search field doesn‚Äôt work. Have learned to work around it but if it isn‚Äôt going to work, remove it.
This makes traveling with an RV very enjoyable. You can plan your trip, see what is available, make the reservations all on the app and more! Never leave home without it!
Indispensable for car camping!  Got me through Washington oregon California utah Nevada Arizona Montana Wyoming Alberta and British Columbia
Took our first long trip with the app. Found that my free app had more of the rv parks listed than this one that I paid $9.99 for.
Bought this app and it never works properly. Only worked 1 or 2 times and hasn‚Äôt worked since even if re downloaded. Don‚Äôt waste your money.

A friend recommended the All Stays app, I really did not want to spend money on an app that I wasn‚Äôt sure would be useful. We are out on our first 30 day trip of 3200 miles round trip and have used it every time we move! It‚Äôs great when you don‚Äôt have reservations and only want to stay one night and take off in the early morning. Wonderful app, works for us.
Former full-time RV‚Äôer and now weekend warrior. This app is ha da down the best out there‚Äîwhether you‚Äôre going cross country or just on day trips.
Use this all the time to review camping spots

Great tool. Been using this site for a couple of years now. Filters make it fast to find what we are looking for.
Full time RVers, we are always using AllStays for places to stop. at.

I was so happy to find this App.  No more paying for Woodall‚Äôs or any books to find Campsites.  This App has everything from Cracker Barrel‚Äôs, Rest Stops, Costco‚Äôs, Wal Mart‚Äôs and all the info that you need for each store.  Tap anything on the map and it will tell you how far you are and how to get there.
Thank you Allstays!!  You have made our RV‚Äôing navigation so easy.
Large database of campsites with all relevant details. Great tool for planning your road trips.

Lots of information, good filters, however there is no way to save your search. You will have to save it on a piece of paper. There should be a way to save favorite places so you don‚Äôt have to store that information elsewhere. The information this app provides needs to be verified. You will still have to save locations in google maps.

label_title: I don‚Äôt know why this costs $10
review: I thought this would be a good app to get especially since it was $10 I thought it would have great information. That is not the case. If you click on the information above the campground like the images tab it just googles the campground. I can do that myself. It‚Äôs also not super user friendly. I guess I don‚Äôt know why anyone would pay for this app when Reserve America is free and you can get everything you need there including booking your camp sites?
Use it every time we travel! Always has what I‚Äôm looking for. In 25,000miles of travel has never let me down.
Once in awhile someplace, like the BLM at Rufus, OR, won‚Äôt show up but for the most part this is the best source. Or at least the first source consulted.  It‚Äôs a great planning tool.

After downloading this App I had problems the first time I updated. I emailed customer support and got an immediate response.
After swapping emails several times I was able to correct the problem and now have it working great. As a full time RVer this app is wonderful for finding campgrounds whereever we are.
This is the 2nd time I've rated this app and my opinion hasn't changed. It's great and it will be one of the 1st I download when my IPAD arrives.
After 10 years on the road in our RV this app is still the best one and the one I use all the time.

My brother in law told me about this app before we took a cross country Rv trip. So incredibly glad we used the app to navigate and find businesses, rest areas, campgrounds and such. This app is user friendly and contains much valuable information. I‚Äôve recommended it to anyone traveling.

Been using this app 2 years.  We WANT to rely on it to be up to date and accurate, however, on many occasions it has proved to be incorrect! Not fun or economical to drive around looking for space to camp only to discover info needs updating!
Example: drove by several which said ‚Äútents‚Äù only- only to discover trailer sites were available... or vice versa.
Best campground app available! If it could only find campgrounds with available sites...lol   ( but kind of serious)

label_title: need to be able to favorite locations!
review: compiled informtion and campgrounds is useful but not 100% reliable, app said there were rest areas in two locations now that are not there, also when planning a trip it is incredibly frustrating to not be able to mark or favorite locations, we had to screenshot all of them or write them down, i think it could be better for the price. all reviews or images are just converted to a web search which is also annoying as it‚Äôs not very reliable i do like the app and it is very useful when looking for a dump station and in particular walmart‚Äôs which we decided to stay at most of them time as RV parks are a rip and your always crammed together over all a good app but needs improvement.

I have been using the program for years. If you RV or camp this program provides all the data you need to make a decision on a campground then provides a link to guide you to the campground. It‚Äôs indispensable when traveling.

Absolutely a must have App if you‚Äôre an RV‚Äôer. Lots of time when traveling we don‚Äôt know where we‚Äôll be when it‚Äôs time to stop for the night. Just fire up the AllStays app and see what‚Äôs close. All the contact and directions info you need are right there. Wouldn‚Äôt leave home without it.

I love this up and been using it A LOT  in the last 5 years for RV &  motorcycle road trip camping and even backcountry . Very straight forward and easy to use and so far all the information in there was up to date. I don‚Äôt always manage to master the ‚Äúsearch‚Äù feature as another user said . Needs to type in the town , state , and even country sometimes ... though no guarantees it will work  . However my greatest wish is for this app to have a FAVORITES BUTTON.... and probably I emailed the developer every single time they released a new update in the last 5 years ... still nothing .... kinda‚Äô disappointing ....   would be so wonderful to be able to have my favorite campgrounds in one place especially when planning for a road trip instead of taking notes on a piece of paper .... especially when the ‚Äúsearch ‚Äú button can‚Äôt keep up with the job ... and certainly unable to search after campgrounds names later ... please, add a FAVORITES button !!!! 5 starts when I‚Äôll see that feature ! Thx
This is our go to app for finding a place to stay while we travel
This is an essential tool that every RVer should have. And - it keeps getting better!

This is my goto app for planning my camping forays which seem to go longer and longer. I have traveled all over the west trying to get to as many National Parks as I can. The filters work very well for me.
A great, must have, app for full time rv‚Äôrs. We use it constantly when we are on the road.

Over all it‚Äôs a good app the search function can be a little funky sometimes. It doesn‚Äôt always return the same info or it has no return for the search. Also it can slow down become unresponsive but a close and reopen normally clears it. I use it all the time for planning not so much while driving. We don‚Äôt make to many random over nite stops so that is fine by us.

label_title: OK but needs work for the price
review: This app gets the job done for overnight parking. For real campground reviews I prefer Campendium, which is free. For the price, this app seems clunky and a bit dated in terms of design. It doesn‚Äôt get my resounding endorsement, but it has occasionally been a useful tool when finding a Cracker Barrel or other quick overnight spot.

Good app, worth the cost!
Plan to utilize often!

Semper Fi and Seabees Can Do!
I‚Äôve found this app to be useful in planning my RV trips. Easy to use, the numerous filters allow for quick searches. Links nicely with Google Map. Highly recommend
This app has saved me a ton on travel expenses. Wouldn't go on any long road trip without it.
Just keeps getting better all the time. I use it all the time.
This is a must have app. If you travel our highways at all this app is for you. We use this app every day we travel. This app gets 10 stars in our book. Safe travelsüòä.
My wife and retired ten years ago are are blessed with good health. This app is our go-to for all trip planning. We have been using with complete satisfaction for close to 50,000 miles of adventures.

Great app use it all the time when we go RVing. Lots of info on everything from RV and campgrounds to propane and dump sites with everything in between. Can‚Äôt imagine not having it now. Highly recommended
Helps us every trip.  Puts lots of information in one easy to use format.  Just avoiding one turn around or lousy camp ground pays for it.
This is a great addition to planning your RV trips! Very helpful!!

Top notch, none better!
This app saved us when our iPhone map stopped working due to spotty reception. We were lost until we turned on Allstays and it knew right where we were and got us to our destination with out a hitch.
We full time in our 43‚Äô motorhome and use the app almost daily to find parks. The Park ratings are accurate and very helpful. We would like to see Loves Travel Stops on your map.
We full time and this is the app I use to find campgrounds and make reservations.

So much crammed into this app except what I‚Äôm interested in: rates. Many California web sites don‚Äôt have rates up so you have to call. The app has dollar signs with more expensive ones w five dollar signs. The image button takes you to a mishmash of photos which are hard to tell if they are even from the Park. User reviews are nonexistent. Using this app we booked a park for this August only to find the town in California has the highest crime rate in the NATION. Never saw that info on this app. So maybe this app is more for the park than it is for the user. Disappointing.

I love this app!  On our recent two week trip to Arizona, it helped us everyday!  We were able to locate rest-stops, gas, BLM land, campgrounds all with reviews!  Worth every cent!  We‚Äôve deleted all other camping related apps!
This app gives campers all the tools needed for well-planned trips as well as fly-by-the-seat-of-your-pants road trips.  Very pleased with this purchase.
We have been using this app for several years now. Always accurate information and extremely user friendly! A must have if you‚Äôre are hitting the road in an RV!

Same complaint as others 
$10 waste of money

We are semi-retired, full time RVers, traveling around the country and picking up a seasonal job occasionally. We started using this app a few days ago and filtered for free places to stay in our 23‚Äô motor home while we are traveling. We saved more than the cost of the app on our first stay. It‚Äôs a no-brainer. Just do it!

label_title: One of my go-to camping app tools!
review: Very helpful for filtering campgrounds in an area.  I love the summary where you can get the rating, reviews, website, phone number, etc all in one visual location. I just wish for a separate, dedicated filter for casino camping!
For anyone with an RV or trailer. We use regularly to find camping sites both in pre-trip planning and in on the fly adjustments on the road. Comprehensive and easy to use.
All Stays has become indispensable for our RV trips. Well thought out, works well on our phone. It has replaced the voluminous campground guides. We love it.
This app won‚Äôt let you down.

As a full time RV traveling family, this app is an ESSENTIAL tool for us. From planning our next stop to just finding a dump station - this it‚Äôs absolutely the most useful, helpful, informative app we‚Äôve come across. Our life is genuinely made easier with this. 100% worth the price tag. I LOVE IT.

Not only is this a great location, the staff was fantastic. My hubby was unexpectedly admitted to the hospital.  The staff was very accommodating, moving the reservation for other campers so I could remain in the space. They filled our propane tanks, offered to get dinner for me and assist in any way possible. They were all very caring and compassionate. 

Now, for the campground.... it‚Äôs conveniently located by a major highway, but we heard very little road noise. They have a fabulous shuttle to the DC Mall, that was well worth the price and cheaper than taking public transportation. 

We will definitely stay here the next time we visit the DC area.

Then you gotta have this app. 

That's all I gotta say about that.

Love this app, I have been traveling for a year and use it to find places to stay. I really like the lists of Army Corp of Engineers and county parks. I did find for the search bar to work, you have to capitalize the city. Maybe the developers can fix the bug.

This app works surprising well on the iPad when NOT connected to Internet. Used it on the road and it was able to show my moving location and gave good summaries of approaching campgrounds. Very helpful.

I've paid for very few apps, and this one is the best money spent. We RV and have found this app most helpful from finding camping spots to fuel stations to rest areas to dump locations. If you travel at all, I highly recommend this app to use in your journeys!
We love this with our families on the east and west coast and we are in the heartland. We absolutely love this app

The detail is amazing. The maps are great. The best feature for us is the ability to filter so many ways. Nothing comes close to the depth of detail this app offers. We purchased the Mac version as well. If you do any camping, road trips or even a professional truck driver this is the app for you.
Pretty good app with pretty good results. It has been pretty accurate. Reviews from users are most helpful.
We always use allstays when we are traveling.  We can easily find truck stops for refueling while towing out big fifth wheel.  Find rest areas and campgrounds.

We usually start with this app when we look for campgrounds.  One of the better apps i've used.  Has one of the fullest listings of campgrounds I've seen. Good info in the reviews.  I‚Äôve left several myself.  I believe you have to pay for this app, but it‚Äôs been worth it.

We use this app almost exclusively. It is very useful. A few things could be improved but overall works great!  The thing I have the most difficulty with is when I put in the name of the city, the app does not take me to that area. Maybe I am doing it incorrectly.

Great app, every RVer should
Have it. I find it indispensable.

label_title: Allstays Camp & RV is my camping bible!
review: I have used Allstays Czmp & RV for over 5 years and it has never steered me wrong. I camp 4 to 6 months a year and I use this app exclusively.

So convenient w phone numbers, addresses, reviews and more. Wouldn‚Äôt RV without it.
Hoping they create an update that helps you to locate organic grocery stores. That would be awesome!

This app is our go to source when we travel in our motorhome will use it not only to find campgrounds but interstate rest areas fuel stops and repair stations along the way our travel would be much more difficult and much less fun without the all stays app

This has been our go to app for several years.  Have traveled throughout the country and it is invaluable for planning and once on the road looking for places to stop.  We do need to comment more because they are very useful. My wife as copilot can use it easily and she can struggle with other apps.

label_title: My Go-To App for RV Travel
review: Allstays Camp & RV is what I use for trip Planning and campsite verification. The ability to also look at Impediments to travel, like low bridges is a huge benefit. It‚Äôs very connected to the world in which we camp and drive.
Has all the right information and it is intuitive to use.  What else could you ask for?

Our go-to source when planning a trip and when we're driving. Great for researching RV parks and fuel stops. Nothing beats finding a truck stop ahead and zooming in on the satellite image to see if we can get in and then out. It's also saved me a couple of times on the road when I needed RV service and spotted a service icon close by. I'd hate to have to travel without this app!

label_title: Best way to find where to camp, get gas, find a way-mart...
review: Love the App.  Wouldn‚Äôt go anywhere without checking the route according to Camp & RV.  It‚Äôs how we roll!
This app is so useful. Locations, elevations, links to more details, wow! If you‚Äôre planning one or more trips around the country this by far is the best app I‚Äôve ever used.

We started full timing 6 months ago and use this app 95% of the time.   It provides the full spectrum of places to stay from free overnight parking to national parks, state parks, BLM land and private parks along with user ratings for each.   The road grade feature is very useful as well.   Best app we‚Äôve found for cross country traveling.
I use this app all the time when planning my trips. It‚Äôs so helpful takes you to the information you are looking for and even maps it out too.
I use this all the time. Living as a full-time traveler, it gives me so much info. Too much to mention.  Great and reliable.

Great app with a lot of available data. Anyone complaining about $10 should stay home and camp in your backyard with you cafe mocha latte.

The main issue I have is the interface and certain elements of data being displayed.

Interface is dated, needs to be updated using more modern design elements.  The worst part so far is the information view for a camp ground.  It's just a large single paragraph with multiple reviews and information without any formatting.  

Still love it after a year. Has payed for itself a few times over... driving 50 miles around in circles looking for places to stop for the night.  Well worth the price of 3 gallons of gas anyway.

label_title: My go to RV park app
review: Love the ease of finding park choices. Star ratings are generally  a good indicator of how a park will be.

I‚Äôve done allot of research and this RV travel app has everything one needs to find a place to stay. From primitive tent camping to luxury RV resorts it has it all and it‚Äôs worth the price. I like that it also shows Canadian locations. If your a snowbird on a budget like me you‚Äôll absolutely love it.

Great app, we like the fact that it has filters, and you can set what you want to search for.  We have a camper van and we can find a lot of places to spend the night where we need to go.    
You can find important information about the place, what kind of hook-ups, when it is closed or open, price, etc.  Very good app.  Get it.  

Ray from California
I had this couple years now it's very informational with pictures, very useful traveling or just finding interesting places. Very worth having.

It‚Äôs alright but less accurate than google maps. One example is we camp at Elks Lodges often. I have yet to find one where we are staying at, typically this APP will tell us about one 50 or 100 miles away from what we need. 

Again, not a bad APP but hardly worth $10. It will clutter your screen with lots of information you don‚Äôt need or want as well. 

My primary search will still be done on Google Maps. I‚Äôll check back with this APP to see if it found anything additional but so far nada.
Very helpful and full of great information.

Traveled from Houston to the Canadian border and back, and this was my go-to app for information.Was always able to find a place to stay it suited my needs. Was even able to plan gas stops at Sam‚Äôs or Costco while traveling through the larger cities. Would not go on any trip without it.

Love it! As others have mentioned, I cannot imagine going on any trip without this app!! I enjoy reading the reviews for specific sites and love that they list specify campsites that open all year which can drastically help in off season travel. Full hookups or just electric. The list of helpful features is unending. Even satellite imagery of the specific area!
Would have been nice to know I needed a subscription before I downloaded it.
This app is awful! Nothing intuitive about how to simply lug your destination from the beginning! WASTE!

App does not work. It cannot locate any address I input. Case in point. I input the Web Developers address 
TeleType Co. Inc.
44 School Street
Boston, MA 02108. 
Their own app they developed cannot even locate their own address. How stupid is that? 
Contacted app support & got a very rude male who told me he could not help & insisted I text him my issue which I did last week. No response at all. I‚Äôm on a three week rv trip & spent $49.99 for a useless app. I demand a refund! Now!
Is deceiving. Not a free app! You can only use the app for an hour for free.

label_title: Not Free Not Updated for Road conditions
review: After entering vehicle info it took us on a route with 5 miles of DIRT road. Waited for 15 minutes for pilot car to lead us 2 miles an hour. No place to turn around to avoid it!! Why charge $50 if you can't give updated road conditions??? Piece of crap!!!

It looks like a great app.  I‚Äôm very disappointed that I didn‚Äôt get to use it because as soon as I asked it to ‚Äòplan route‚Äô it asked me to subscribe.  $9.99/7 days, $29.99/? mths or $49.99 yrly.
I don‚Äôt know who gave this thing 5 stars. Must be a FOD (friend of the developer). Useless.
It‚Äôs a rip-off don‚Äôt even waste your time

We purchased this when RAnd McNally did away with their RV GPS app.  Was very unsure of it with the reviews I read but decided to try it.  We LOVE it!  We have been traveling for 3 months using it each travel day and it has been wonderful.  It is a very good tool for any size RV.  You put all of your RV specs into the settings (i.e. Height, weight, length) and it routes according to the best route for your rig.  You can choose, most highway, RV quickest, or RV fastest.  You can't go wrong with his app.
Says it's free, but doesn't let you use the GPS without paying.

We have test run this but at some points very confusing.  Following the map portion is okay but when you go to the written instructions to look ahead the prior instructions are still there so you have to search the list to your current location.  I wish once you have passed locations they would drop off like they do when you use Google Maps.

label_title: App doesn't work. Company refuses to provide refund
review:
Buttons do not work on IPAD.  Called company to request refund.  They acknowledged issue and provided a three day extension on subscription, promising to resolve the issue in three days.  It has now been a week; problem has not been resolved.
They have my money for an application that doesn't work on my IPAD.
Takes you through low bridges, gets you lost in downtown Manhattan. Does not suggest upper level on bridges. DO NOT BUY THIS APP!!!!!
Still commercial truck centered.  Limited RV park info and listings, most parks don't display on map.  Not sure it's worth $50 a year to be warned of a steep hill.

Installed, started and closed.  Tried twice, even changed the privacy settings.  Did not work.  I have a current iPhone and OS.  Quickest install to delete for me so far.  Oh well, the truck version did not have good reviews.
I downloaded this and it will not open.
Junk, don't do it, it set me on a route that was NOT safe for my family in our RV. This is absolutely why we were looking for a navigational app to begin with. Irritated...
There is no price listed for the subscription! How much does it cost?
I do not see anywhere that gives a price. I know you can get this for seven days, three months, or a year. Please someone tell me what are the prices

What I have found is occasionally the campground is closed/changed hands/ or private.  Some local/town campgrounds are not listed.  However, overall it a good reference for potential locations. Great app

We are full time RVers and it is a valuable tool for us.  I run it on my phone as we travel so that we can find fuel stops, shopping,  and RV parks nearby. The ability to phone or navigate to a site directly from the app is handy.  We also rely on it for trip planning.  We couldn‚Äôt live without it.
Only used it a little so far but I really like it.
We are using this app while we are on vacation and it is very helpful. We are about to plan ahead and get a spot.
So far this has helped us immensely. Sometimes wish more reviews per campground but not app's fault.

Used the app on a trip from Texas to Maine towing a 5th wheel. Found the app to be the best ever to locate/select a campground. The display of Walmart, fueling locations and the clearance warnings are very helpful. It would really enhance the navigation function to show the low clearance locations on your actual selected routes. 
Planning a trip to British Columbia and am using the app now to plan my route.

The more I use this app the better I like it. Very helpful when traveling in my Motorcoach. Lots of helpful info on numerous campgrounds at my fingertips. Info on campgrounds so far appears accurate. Wouldn't be without it.
I like this app but haven‚Äôt used it yet for camping. Will comment more after I use it more.
Very helpful. Not only gives reviews also shows you location and will go to the GPS and tell you direction.
Love this app. Easy, accurate and free. What could be better?
Works flawlessly
Has lots of information that is very good for researching campgrounds,  parking,  and other facilities.
So far I like it.

Just did a road trip and couldn‚Äôt have done it without this app. Very useful and a ton of great features for free. You can see how much campsites cost and what amenities they have to figure out the right campground for you. 

Only downside is that information at some sites needs updating, but for the most part it‚Äôs pretty accurate. Other user reviews helped with that though!
Great app, helpful for planning and while on the road! Some times I have found some outdated campground information, but overall usually not a problem.
Great for finding RV resorts while traveling, I use this app a lot.

label_title: Excellent tool for finding great sites.
review: This App is great for first timers and those that travel all the time. I will continue to use and bounce the site picks with other apps picks and reviews. It would be 5 stars if all users reviewed but there are only some that leave them and most only when they have a bad experience. I thank all of the people that review good or bad.
Great for locating campgrounds, but they apparently had the wrong web addresses for Illinois state parks. I had to use Reserve America.

App is great. Only suggestion is that it would be cool to be able to search for campgrounds with showers! Or search for the places that allow overnight parking. Sometimes it‚Äôs hard to pull over to go click on every location to see the info and all Walmart‚Äôs or stops don't allow parking overnight.

Traveling around US and Canada! App has saved me a few times when I didn‚Äôt have a plan for sleep. Some places aren‚Äôt perfect but the app shows you all your options even parking lots that are okay for over night parking! I highly recommend and I hope people keep reviewing the places too! Thank you
I use this app all the time.  It also includes the website for the campground if they have one so I can get all the amenities offered.  It also includes gas stations and stores nearby.
awesome for xcountry motorcycle trips :)

Great app for planning trips and traveling across the country. I did not realize how expensive some campgrounds are so showing actual costs would have been helpful. However the $$$ symbols are appreciated. I look forward to more details and photos in the future.
We used this App last summer for 3 months. It was terrific. We tend to stay in KOAs, but where there weren't any - this helped us find great places.

All we could ask is to add the price per night as one of your competitors does, however that other app otherwise falls far short of your great features. We‚Äôve been RVing for 8 years and like your app the best. Just wish it told us how much we can expect to pay without going to the camp website or phoning. Thanks. 
... The Graves Family

Best app for finding campgrounds yet, found the ones that were not found by google.  Map is downloaded and stored so even when you do t have service on your cell phone this will guide you.  That happens a lot more than you would think!

label_title: Great App, use it every time.
review: Plenty of information for the person looking for a week long location or just an over night rest.
Very useful app on the road.
I love this site! The reviews whether good or bad are very helpful, and pretty accurate! Some make for funny reading material!! I enjoy looking at the sight from time -to-time, and when necessary.

label_title: Made our cross country trip easy!
review: We took a cross country trip this summer with 3 kids under 5 (one being a newborn). We weren‚Äôt sure how far we would be able to get each day with the unpredictability of the kids so this app saved us! We were able to use it whenever we needed to find a stop for the night or a stop immediately when the kids needed a break. Also it was nice knowing beforehand which Walmart‚Äôs were available for overnight parking since they are always hit and miss. We never knew you could park at Cabelas until we saw them on this app! Great tool to save money on road trips.

New to RVing. Used it to plan our first trip to Penn State, worked great. Was able to easily identify and scout out all the camp grounds in the are. Even showed me a the local parking lots that are RV friendly for those quick 2 day trips I‚Äôll be making.

This is a wonderful app except there is no way to save a park/campground you really like to favorites. We are snowbirds and RV every summer and live to keep a list of all the places we‚Äôve been. We share them with our RV Forum members.  This app would be amazing if we could save our favorite parks and make boards and refer back to
Them.  Thanks for the opportunity to share our opinion.
Getting ready for a western trip. So far it looks like it will be a great tool . Will review again after trip

Me encanta esta aplicaci√≥n. Desde hace 1 semana que la baje y me muestra todos los lugares de rv parks... solo mueves el mapa serca y te da todos los lugares. Hasta te dice donde hay markets , gasolina, etc... muy buena app... la unico malo esque no puedes aguardar tus lugares en los que as pasado lugares favoritos. Please update this so we can save our favorite rv parks...
ParkAdvisor is a great app. I use it all the time. The map is so useful as are the reviews and navigation guides. I HIGHLY recommend it!
Very helpful when traveling. Able to locate parks in the area where we are going.

We are new to RVing but love to travel, this app has found every single park we‚Äôve stayed at. I‚Äôd like for more people to review site on the app but other than that, it works great. I love that there‚Äôs a link to click and call the park, make reservations and it‚Äôs super easy. The RV friendly gas stations are helpful as well. Thanks so much!

We have used it exclusively for last 2 years up and down the east coast. All kinds of great information!
Inge
I use several RV apps, this is by far the easiest .

We are relatively new to the RV experience,  but have traveled almost monthly since summer of 2017, and I use this app EVERY time we plan a road trip. This app has proven to be a keeper for locating and selecting both one night stop-overs and week long visits.  Best:  obviously easy pins show locations for camping, state parks, and RV resorts.  Worst: keeping the pins updated for locations that may no longer be available, and reviews are often sparse.
Has most, but not all campgrounds, great way to plan a trip, is mostly up to date. The graphical map is excellent.
How do I search just for BLM sites?

As a full time rv‚Äôer, I use Park Adviser daily to plan and navigate to campgrounds, including state and federal parks. The map function works well and I like the clearance warnings, truck stop and Walmart icons for planning and stopping purposes. This is my top app to recommend to other campers on the road.
I just used the Ap on an Orlando to California and back tracking the Old Route 66.  Its the easiest way to find RV Campgrounds.

Very helpful in locating state and federal campgrounds which we love. Occasionally misses on the directions to the park. Combined with other map apps one can easily check before departure. 
Would love to see everyone routing to include easy in and out diesel stations and bridge height filters added.
Good App. Helps find the campground that fits your needs easy. Not totally perfect but what is really. Have it on all my devices.
The app is user friendly and offers a lot of useful information.

label_title: Great for finding RV dump stations!
review: Seems great for finding RV dump stations. Also good for campsites. Pretty cool
It‚Äôs accurate and O so easy,,,

I‚Äôve only been using this app a short time but have made reservations at several campsites for a future trip. I didn‚Äôt know there were this many campsites in the US! If your traveling in a big rig it nice to know where the truck stops like TA and Pilot are and this app shows them. So far I‚Äôm very impressed!
I find ParkAdvisor to be very useful in finding both private and government sites including national forest sites. The app is extremely useful!
We have been full time rving for almost 2 yrs.  this app has been excellent for us. We use it for all of our parks when we travel.
Easy to use. Map feature shows location and info about campgrounds, fuel stops, rest areas, Walmarts, low clearance bridges, and more. Perfect app for RV travel planning.
This is one of several RV campground review apps that I use to choose where to stay. I like to see as many user reviews as possible and this fits the bill.
Great site used for our rv trips comes in handy thanks
We are new to camping. I love having an app that shows us camping areas around us and also supplies campers‚Äô reviews. I also love that it has no ads.
Let‚Äôs you follow your proposed route across state lines always updating campgrounds. App has one of the largest campground inventories among those I have tried.
Love it makes it easy to find places to stay as traveling.  We like to freelance and take back roads
Great app for locating places to park on the road. Very helpful for taking breaks on long trips and finding supplies along the way. Some sites are not there. Overall great app.

I like the inclusion of businesses useful to RV travelers, Walmart, Sam‚Äôs Club, Loves, Travel America, Costco and etc.  The requested reviews for each listing are very helpful also.  The searchable map is probably my favorite feature.  This allows the user to pinpoint useful information giving proximity to your location or planned location.

label_title: Best app I‚Äôve found so far!
review: I think this app is fabulous and it is my go to app to find campgrounds or even overnight Boondocking sites.  I love that you can go directly to the websites from each information page, know the amenities, see pictures and I love that it can show me navigation instantly so I can see how far away I am from any site!  Great app!

This is an awesome app. We did 5,000 miles in 13 days and we just used this app. We have a Diesel 40 foot RV and we were able to maneuver truckstops and RV parks along the way, making reservations hours before we camped. The campsites were awesome and the people were very nice. would recommend this site if you were going on this type of vacation or trip.

Tried several others, but this is the best. I love maps and I just follow my route and check this app for the best RV places to stay. Reviews by folks who use are are pretty spot on and honest. Has some RV parks need to be updated. Shows those that are closed down too. Also shows state parks as well as Walmart, Costco, Camping Worlds, and many gas stations and several other places that are needed along the way.
Especially if you are ‚Äòwinging‚Äô it with no real plan.  Reviews are good but sometime the service led ones should be purged
It gives you mileage and directions.  Great app.
Only once did the app have an outdated address, and that was not big problem. I purchased the upgraded version and I am not sure it was necessary. I am very happy with it and use it often.
This app is amazing! The maps are accurate and the database has tons of information on rates, locations, phone numbers and grounds descriptions.
I use this app all the time. It's great! In the mountain states it would be helpful if the campground elevation were listed in the description.
Worked once, but now whenever I open the app the map is blank

I rode my motorcycle thru all the lower 48 States this past summer and am glad I had it. I had a small one man tent and found that most "Campgrounds" cost almost as much as a motel and are really RV parks is disguise.
